[\[197b.3\]]gzhan gyi dbang du gyur pa rnams rnam par bral ba dang /_rims nad med pa dang /_phan tshun du phrag dog dang 'thab rtsod kyi 'jigs pa rnams med par gyur nas rtse dga' bar byed do/_/de ltar saM kA sha'i ri zab mo'i nags la so sor brtags par gyur pas kyang yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du lus so sor 
[\[197b.4\]]rig par byed do/_/gzhan yang rnal 'byor spyod pa phyi rol gyi lus kyis lus la rjes su lta zhing gnas te/_byang phyogs sgra mi snyan gyi gling gi ri dang po saM kA sha'i nags bzhi pa la gzhan bsil ba'i chu ci yod/_des thos pa las byung ba'i shes rab kyis sam lha'i mig gis mthong bar gyur pa/_bsil 
[\[197b.5\]]ba'i chu'i chu klung chu rnams ni rab tu phal che ba yod la/_ji skad du brjod pa'i ljon shing dang /_me tog dang 'bras bu rnams kyang phun sum tshogs pa yin no/_/chu klung yod pa rnams ni 'di lta ste/_bsil ba'i chu ni rgyar dpag tshad du gyur pa'o/_/chu klung zab mo'i chu dang /_rab tu dang ba'i chu dang /_
[\[197b.6\]]gtsang ba'i chu dang /_'o ma'i chu dang /_rgun 'bru'i chu dang /_zla ba rgyu ba dang /_'o thug gi 'dam dang /_gram sag gi chu dang /_ngang ngur gyis gang ba dang /_ngang pa kun du sgra 'byin pa dang /_dbyangs snyan pa dang /_me tog rgyu ba dang /_sems 'gro ba dang /_'u ru ru'i sgras 'bab pa dang /_rlabs 'byung 
[\[197b.7\]]ba dang /_bde ba'i chu dang /_ka dam+ba 'khod pa nyid dang /_nor bu'i mchu can rnams kyis 'dzin pa dang /_chu srin kUrma mang ba nyid dang /_nya ro hi 'khor ba dang rus sbal gyis gang ba dang /_chu srin na kras bskor ba dang /_yid bde bar 'bab pa dang /_dbu ba'i phreng ba dang /_rab tu dga' bar gyur 
[\[198a\]]
[\[198a.1\]]pa'i chu dang rlung mtshungs pa dang /_char dang char gyi rjes su 'byung ba'i chu klung dang /_dbyangs can gyi mdog tu 'bab pa dang /_dus su 'bab pa dang /_ring pa dang /_rtse mo'i dang /_gser gyi chu dang /_dngul gyi mdog dang /_mu tig gi bye ma dang ldan pa dang /_ri bo la rgyu ba dang /_
[\[198a.2\]]sprin 'khor ba dang /_mu sa ra galba rgyan du byas pa dang /_bi dru ma'i shing dang ldan pa dang /_dpyid dga' ba dang /_dbyar sprin rab tu dang ba'i chu 'bab pa dang /_rtse mo la 'jug par dga' ba dang /_gangs yod pa dang /_nyi ma shar bar gyur pas mi reg pa dang /_myur ba'i chu dang /_rlabs rab tu 'jug pa dang /_
[\[198a.3\]]a Du bA dang /_tsu lun+da 'bab pa dang /_dri'i chu dang /_ke ta ka'i dris bsgos pa dang /_dbyar dga' ba dang /_d+hu na d+hu mA rA dang /_nye 'khor na khyab pa dang /_dpag tu med pa 'bab pa dang /_rgyab nas klung kun du gang bar rab tu 'bab pa dang /_dma' ba'i chu dang /_dga' bas 'jug pa dang /_sngon gyi 
[\[198a.4\]]du ba'i stobs dang /_sprin gyi 'gros dang /_dri za'i dbyangs can dang /_rnga'i sgra'i dbyangs can dang /_skad kyi dbyangs can dang /_klu'i bu mo mngon par dga' ba dang /_gsang ba rtse dga' ba dang /_rig pa 'dzin pa rtse dga' bas gnas pa dang rnams yin no/_/de dag ni ri saM kA sha'i nags bzhi pa 
[\[198a.5\]]sprin dkar po la ji ltar 'bab chu'i gtso bor gyur pa bdun cu yin par rab tu brjod pa yin no/_/bar ma tha ma'i chu klung rnams ni ma gtogs pa yin no/_/gzhal du med pa dga' bar gyur pa'i shing dang /_me tog dang /_bya rnams kyi yon tan gyis bla na med par gyur pa'i bsil ba'i chu'i 
[\[198a.6\]]nags la so sor brtags par gyur pas kyang yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du phyi rol rig par byed do/_/gzhan yang rnal 'byor spyod pa phyi rol gyi lus kyis lus la rjes su lta zhing gnas pa na/_des thos pa las byung ba'i shes rab kyis sam lha'i mig gis mthong bar gyur pa/_saM kA sha'i 
[\[198a.7\]]ri la bi shrA maM zhes bya ba'i nags lnga pa yod pa yin te/_gang la klu mi bzad pa 'di dag rtse dga' bar byed pa'o/_/'di lta ste/_khro ba bral ba dang /_bA su ki dang /_staSh+ka ko dang /_mche ba'i dug dang /_glog gi phreng ba dang /_sprin gyi nye 'khor chos la dbang ba dang /_rnam pa de lta bu'i klu 
[\[198b\]]
[\[198b.1\]]stong phrag bdun rtse dga' bar byed do/_/byang phyogs sgra mi snyan gyi nye 'khor rnams su chos kyi char pa 'bebs par byed do/_/ji ltar sa gzhi dang nam mkha'i nye 'khor rnams kyang shin tu byang phyogs sgra mi snyan pa'i 'jig rten pa rnams dang 'dra ba yin no/_/gzhan yang rnal 'byor spyod 
[\[198b.2\]]pa phyi rol gyi lus kyis lus la rjes su lta zhing gnas te/_ci saM ka shA'i ri'i nags rnams ni ji skad du sngar bstan pa bzhin du gyur pa yin la ljon shing re re lo mar gyur pa rnams dang /_me tog tu gyur pa rnams dang /_'bras bur gyur pa rnams dang /_chu klung du gyur pa rnams dang /_rdo'i gseb tu 
[\[198b.3\]]gyur pa rnams dang /_sa phyogs kyi char gyur pa rnams dang /_rtswa'i gseb tu gyur pa rnams dang /_ri'i khrad khrod dang khong gseng du gyur pa rnams dang /_'bab chur gyur pa la yang rung ste/_khab kyis phug pa'i bar tsam gang dag la yang sems can thams cad lan brgya dang /_gal te na 
[\[198b.4\]]lan brgya stong du yang ma skyes pa dang /_ma shi ba dang /_'chi ma 'phos pa dang /_ma skyes par ma gyur pa'am/_yid du 'ong ba rnams thams cad dang tha dad du ma gyur pa dang /_rnam par gyes par ma gyur pa dang /_rnam par bral bar ma gyur pa dang /_gzhan du ma gyur pa'am/_dgrar gyur pa'i lus 'di 
[\[198b.5\]]lan brgya dang /_de nas lan stong du dang /_lan brgya stong du yang skyes par ma gyur pa ni med do/_/gang la sems can rnams thams cad kyang shi ba dang skyes par ma gyur pa de ni khab kyi bug pa tsam yang go skabs ma mthong ngo /_/des saM kA sha'i ri la so sor brtags par gyur 
[\[198b.6\]]pas kyang yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du lus so sor rig par byed do/_/gzhan yang rnal 'byor spyod pa phyi rol gyi lus kyis lus la rjes su lta zhing gnas te/_byang phyogs sgra mi snyan na dga' bar gyur pa'i ri'i rigs gzhan yod dam zhe na/_gzhan yang rnal 'byor spyod pa 
[\[198b.7\]]pas thos pa las byung ba'i shes rab kyis sam/_lha'i mig gis mthong bar gyur pa mchog tu dga' bar gyur pa'i lha rnams kyi dga' ba'i tshal dang 'dra bar rwa mnyam pa zhes bya ba'i ri gzhan yod do/_/de'i ljon shing dang /_'bras bu dang /_chu klung dang /_ri'i phug 
[\[199a\]]
[\[199a.1\]]rnams kyi dga' ba ni rgyas par sngar saM kA sha la ji skad bshad pa bzhin no/_/dga' bar gyur pa'i dus kyi khyad par rnams so sor bye brag tu bya ste/_rwa mnyam par gyur pa'i ri gang la rwa brgya phrag gsum ni gser gyi yin te/_mtshungs pa med pa yin no/_/'od zer rnams 
[\[199a.2\]]nyi ma gnyis pa bzhin du gsal lo/_/rwa brgya phrag lnga ni dngul gyi rang bzhin yin te/_gang la dngul gyi rang bzhin du gyur pa ni gang sngar bshad pa rnams bzhin no/_/yon tan rnams thams cad la yang khyab par yod de/_rwa mnyam pa'i ri de'i nye 'khor rnams na yang byang phyogs sgra mi 
[\[199a.3\]]snyan pa'i skyes bu rnams zla ba rgyas pa'i 'od dang 'dra ba yin no/_/de dag rnams ni 'jigs pa dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i ming dang ldan pa yin no/_/'jigs pa dang bral ba'i skyes bu rnams rwa mnyam pa'i ri la ni ji ltar rgyal chen ris bzhi'i lha rnams dga' ba'i tshal na dbyar zla ba bzhir 
[\[199a.4\]]lha rdzas kyi 'dod pa'i yon tan lngas yongs su tshim pa yang dag par ldan par gyur pa la rtse dga' bar byed pa de bzhin du mngon par rtse dga' bar byed do/_/de lta na yang 'jigs pa dang bral ba'i skyes bu rnams dang rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams kyi so so'i khyad par gang dag yin zhe na/_lha rnams ni 
[\[199a.5\]]sha dang /_rus pa dang /_chu ser dang bral ba yin la/_'jigs pa dang ma bral ba'i skyes bu rnams ni sha dang /_rus pa dang /_chu ser dang ma bral bar yod pa yin no/_/lha rnams dang 'jigs pa bral ba'i skyes bu rnams kyi khyad par ni de ltar yin no/_/skyes bu 'jigs pa dang bral ba 
[\[199a.6\]]rnams ni bdag 'dzin med pa dang /_nga rgyal med pa dang /_nges par gong du 'gro bar 'gyur ba yin no/_/lha rnams ni de ltar yang ma yin no/_/yang 'jigs pa dang bral ba'i skyes bu rnams dang rgyal chen ris bzhi'i lha rnams kyi so so'i khyad par gang dag yin na/_rwa mnyam pa'i ri'i 
[\[199a.7\]]nye 'khor rnams na dpag bsam gyi shing nyi ma gnyis pa ltar rab tu gsal bar byed do/_/gang dang gang dag 'jigs pa dang bral ba'i skyes bu rnams kyis sems kyis bsams par gyur pa de dag rnams ljon shing de rnams las 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/thag pas btags pa'am/_nor bu'i rigs 
[\[199b\]]
[\[199b.1\]]rnams sam/_rgyan gyi rigs rnams dang /_zas dang skom gyi chu bo yang brgya phrag dang /_de nas stong phrag kyang 'bab bo/_/ji skad du bshad par gyur pa'i bya rgyags pa rnams kyang rtse dga' bar byed do/_/gser gyi lo ma rnams kyis brgyan par gyur pa dang /_baiDUr+ya sngon po rnams kyi pad 
[\[199b.2\]]ma'i rdzing bu mang po brgya phrag dang /_ci ste na stong phrag rnams la ngang pa dang ka raN+Da ba rnams kyis gang ba/_tsakra ba ka rjes su rgyu ba dang /[ {]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]kyi tshogs rnams rjes su brten par gyur pa ni gser gyi [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]rnams byi ru'i rang bzhin gyi rwa dang /_mu sa ra'i mig dang /_rA dza paT+Ta'i rmig pa 
[\[199b.3\]]ste/[ {]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]kyi rigs gzhan rnams kyis kyang rjes su rgyu bar byed pa yin no/_/ri de'i nye 'khor rnams na mu tig gi dra bas sbrel bar gyur pa'i 'khri shing gi tshogs phan tshun du 'khril bas g.yogs pa dang /_rwa mnyam pa'i ri de la ko ki la dang /_rma bya dang /_ngang pa dang rnams sgra 
[\[199b.4\]]'byin par byed pa dang /_ri 'di la 'bab chu stong phrag brgyas kyang kun tu gang ba dang /_'di la chu klung du ma rnams dang shing klung du skyes pa rnams kyis gang bar gyur pa yin te/_nye 'khor rnams na yon tan mtha' yas pa dang ldan pa yin no/_/des byang phyogs sgra mi snyan pa'i ri bo gnyis 
[\[199b.5\]]pa rwa mnyam pa la kun tu bltas par gyur pas kyang yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du lus so sor rtogs so/_/chu klung gang dang gang dag 'bab par gyur pa de dag rnams ni mtshungs par yon tan brgyad dang ldan pa'i chu yin no/_/'di lta ste/_ro phun sum tshogs pa dang /_rab tu dang ba dang /_
[\[199b.6\]]dri zhim pa dang /_skom pa sel bar byed pa dang /_bsil bar gyur pa dang /_'thungs par gyur pa na lus na bar mi byed pa dang /_chu bal gyis mi gtsang bar ma byas pa dang /_chu srin ma ka ras ma reg pa dang /_de 'thungs pas lus tshim par byed pa dang rnams so/_/nad kyang skyed par 
[\[199b.7\]]mi byed do/_/mtsho rnams kyang rnam pa du ma yod do/_/'di lta ste/_rgya mtsho chen po'i sa nu dang /_bye mas ma bcom pa dang /_shing lnga pa dang /_kA raN+Da ba'i klung dang /_ngang pa'i chu dang /_ka dam+ba'i bya rnams kyis bcom pa dang /_bya brgya phrag gis kun tu gang ba dang /_chen po rab 
[\[200a\]]
[\[200a.1\]]tu 'bab pa dang /_pad mas bkab par gyur pa dang /_'od ma skyes pa dang /_shing gis g.yogs pa dang /_zab mo dang zla ba dga' ba dang /_rtag tu zla ba dang 'dres pa'i chu dang /_rlabs 'khor bar gyur pa dang /_'od mas khyab par gyur pa dang /_rig pa 'dzin pa dga' 
[\[200a.2\]]ba dang /_shel 'khor bar byed pa dang /_rlabs g.yo ba dang /_chu brtan pa dang /_nya 'khor ba dang /_nya dang kun tu 'brel pa dang /_rtse mo'i gseb dang /_khrus kyi rdzing bu'i phreng ba dang /_rlabs rab tu 'jug pa dang /_gtsang ba'i chu dang /_zla ba'i lus dang /_dkyil 'khor dang /_dri 
[\[200a.3\]]ma med pa dang /_'od ma'i chu dang /_rdzing bu'i phreng ba dang /_rngul ba ngal so ba dang /_zla ba dga' ba dang /_shel 'jug pa dang /_rlabs g.yo ba dang /_chu brtan pa dang /_rtag pa'i chu dang /_lha dga' ba dang /_dga' ba'i chu dang /_ro bzang po dang /_ji ltar 'dod pa'i ro dang /_
[\[200a.4\]]longs spyod du gyur pa dang /_kau Tub+haHdang /_bdud rtsi 'bab pa dang /_mtsho'i mchog dang /_klu'i be ruHdang /_mdzes pa dang /_ardzu naHdang zhes bya ba ste/_de dag rnams ni mtsho bzhi bcu rtsa bdun yin no/_/ri'i mchog tu gyur pa rwa mnyam pa 'di dag thams cad kyang yon tan 
[\[200a.5\]]brgyad pa'i chu sngar ji skad bshad pa bzhin no/_/rwa mnyam pa'i ri yang mtho bar gyur pa ni nam mkha' 'bigs pa bzhin du gnas pa yin no/_/nags rnams kyang yon tan de dag rnams thams cad dang ldan par gyur pa yin te/_'di ltar rngul bas reg pa'i nags dang zla ba'i mdog 
[\[200a.6\]]dang dngul gyi ljon shing ni dngul gyi rang bzhin gyi ljon shing rnams kyis bskor ba dpag tshad brgya yin no/_/nor bu'i 'od kyi mdog dang /_nags de'i nye 'khor na mtho bar gyur pa rnams ni nags de la yang pad ma'i rdzing bu 'di dag rnams yin no/_/'di lta ste/_chu bal dang /_rnam par 
[\[200a.7\]]bral ba dang /_bung bas khyab pa dang /_dung gi mdog dang /_rtag pa'i chu dang /_rnam par mthong bas dga' ba dang /_kA dam+ba'i chu dang /_ngang pa'i gshog pas bcom pa dang /_rab tu rtse bar byed pa dang /_skye bo rnams mngon par dga' ba dang /_mgo bo mthong ba dang /_bag med pa 
[\[200b\]]
[\[200b.1\]]rnams rtse ba dang /_rtag tu mngon par dga' ba dang /_rtag tu pad ma rab tu dga' ba dang /_chu la spyod pa'i sa gzhi dang de dag rnams ni ji ltar pad ma'i rdzing bu'i gtso bor gyur pa bcu drug yin te/_gang dag gi ming rnams kyang shes par mi 'gyur ba'i bar ma dang tha mar gyur pa brgya 
[\[200b.2\]]phrag rnams dang de nas stong phrag rnams ni ma gtogs so/_/thams cad kyang 'dam bag med pa dang /_chu bal gyis nye bar ma bcom pa dang /_ngang pa dang /_kA raN+Da ba dang /_ngang ngur rnams sgra 'don par byed pa yin no/_/rtag tu dga' ston gyi nyi mar gyur pa byang phyogs sgra 
[\[200b.3\]]mi snyan pa'i skyes bu rnams bya rtag tu myos pa dang /_shang shang te'u dang /_bya b+h+ring ga ra dza dang /_rma bya rnams nags dang nye ba'i nags rnams na sgra 'don par byed pa ni rwa mnyam pa'i ri yin no/_/rwa mnyam pa'i ri la so sor brtags par gyur pas kyang yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du phyi rol 
[\[200b.4\]]gyi lus so sor rig par byed do/_/gzhan yang 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi la lhag par mos par gyur pa'i rnal 'byor spyod pa phyi rol gyi lus kyis lus la rjes su lta zhing gnas te/_rwa mnyam pa'i ri la rtag pa'am/_brtan pa'am/_bde ba'am/_bdag dang bcas pa'am/_stong 
[\[200b.5\]]pa ma yin pa'i gnas dag yod dam zhe na sngar bzhin no/_/gang la yang 'khor bar rtogs par gyur pa'i sems can rnams thams cad kyang ma skyes pa dang /_ma shi ba dang /_rgas par ma gyur pa'am/_'thun pa dang yid du 'ong ba rnams thams cad kyang tha dad du gyur pa dang /_rnam 
[\[200b.6\]]par gyes pa dang /_rnam par bral ba dang /_slu ba dang /_kun tu ldan par ma gyur pa rnams ni rnal 'byor spyod pa des rwa mnyam pa'i ri de la gnas gcig kyang ma mthong ngo /_/gang dag rtag pa'am/_brtan pa'am/_bde ba'am/_bdag dang bcas par gyur pa'am/_stong pa ma 
[\[200b.7\]]yin pa dang /_gang la sems can rnams thams cad kyang ma skyes pa dang /_ma rgas pa dang /_ma shi ba yang med de/_'thun par yid du 'ong bar gyur pa rnams ni thams cad kyang med par 'gyur ba dang /_tha dad du 'gyur ba dang /_'bral bar 'gyur ba dang /_slu bar 'gyur ba 
[\[201a\]]
[\[201a.1\]]dang kun tu ldan par 'gyur ba yin no/_/rab tu ldan par gyur pa yin pa nyid kyi phyir 'khor ba 'di thams cad ni mi rtag pa yin no/_/de ltar mi rtag par gyur pa'i gnas rnams thams cad gang la yang sems can rnams thams cad kyang ma skyes pa dang /_ma shi ba dang /_
[\[201a.2\]]skyes par ma gyur pa ni khab kyis phug pa tsam gyi yul phyogs kyang med do/_/'phags pa'i bden pa bzhir gyur pa'i dran pa dang ldan pas byang phyogs sgra mi snyan pa rnams kyi ri bo gnyis par gyur pa rwa mnyam par gyur pa thams cad la kun tu bltas par gyur pas kyang phyi rol gyi lus lta 
[\[201a.3\]]bar byed do/_/gzhan yang rnal 'byor spyod pa phyi rol gyi lus kyis lus la rjes su lta zhing gnas te/_byang phyogs sgra mi snyan na nags dga' bar gyur pa gzhan dag dmigs sam zhe na/_des thos pa las byung ba'i shes rab kyis sam lha'i mig gis mthong bar gyur pa ri gsum pa 
[\[201a.4\]]yang yod pa yin te/[ {]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]kyi dgra dul ba zhes bya ba'i ri'o/_/de la dga' bar gyur pa khyad par med pa gang dag yin pa de dag rnams ni saM kA sha'i ri dang rwa mnyam par gyur pa'i ri la yongs su bsgrags par zad do/_/[{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]kyi dgra dul ba'i ri bo de la ni 'bab chu dang chu bo rnams 
[\[201a.5\]]phun sum tshogs pa dang /_chang gi chu klung phun sum tshogs pa dang /_gos kyi ljon shing phun sum tshogs par gyur pa rnams dang /_'di dag kyang khyad par yin te/_'di ltar gser dang dngul gyi ljon shing rnams la rtag par dus drug tu me tog gi phreng ba rnams kyis phyug par gyur 
[\[201a.6\]]nas kun dga' ba dang ldan pa bzhin du rgyas pa yin no/_/shing rnams ni rang gi 'od dang ldan par nyi ma bzhin du rab tu gsal bar yang byed do/_/phan tshun du 'od 'phro bar gyur pas kyang [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]kyi dgra dul ba'i ri bo 'di rab tu gsal bar byed do/_/de la nags 'di dag rnams yod 
[\[201a.7\]]do/_/'di lta ste/_gser dang ldan pa dang /_dngul mthon por brtsegs pa dang /_myos pa sgo nga las skyes pa'i ngos dang /_mnan na nam la bteg na 'phar ba dang rnams so/_/de la gser dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i nags ni dpag tshad brgya pa ste/_gser gyi ljon shing rnams la 
[\[201b\]]
[\[201b.1\]]bung bas legs par khyab par gyur pa yin no/_/dngul mthon por brtsegs pa'i nags dpag tshad sum brgya pa ste/_dngul gyi rang bzhin gyi ljon shing rnams kyis kun tu gang bar gyur nas zla ba brgya stong bzhin du rnam par gsal bar byed do/_/seng ge rnams kyis kyang kun tu 
[\[201b.2\]]gang ba yin no/_/nags de yang thams cad nas dkar por kun tu snang ba yin te/_rtag par rab tu dga' bar gyur pa'i bya rnams kyis kyang kun tu gang ba rnams ni ji ltar sngar bshad pa bzhin no/_/[{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]kyi dgra dul ba'i ri bo'i nags gsum pa ni myos pa'i sgo nga las skyes 
[\[201b.3\]]pa'i ngos zhes bya ba ste/_de la nags de na ni bag med pas rab tu dga' ba'i bya rnams yod do/_/nags de'i nye 'khor rnams na yang skyes bu gang dang gang dag rab tu gnas par gyur pa de dag rnams kyang rtag tu dul ba zhes bya ba'i ming du 'gyur ro/_/skyes bu dag rtag tu myos pa sgo 
[\[201b.4\]]nga las skyes pa'i nags na rab tu dga' bar gyur pa yin te/_rang 'dod pa bzhin du gyur pa'i gzi brjid kyis lha'i tshogs rnams dang 'dra ba yin no/_/[{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]kyi dgra dul ba'i ri la nags bzhi pa ni mnan na nem la bteg na 'phar ba zhes bya ba ste/_nem pa dang 'phar ba'i nags 
[\[201b.5\]]de na ljon shing gang dag gser dang gser rab tu 'bar ba dang /_bi dru ma'i rang bzhin yin pa rnams la ni ma bcings pa'i bya rnams kyis rtag tu gang ba yin no/_/nem la 'phar ba'i nags ni dpag tshad lnga yin no/_/nags de'i nye 'khor rnams na skyes bu gang dag rab tu gnas par gyur 
[\[201b.6\]]pa de dag rnams kyi tha snyad ni rab tu phal che bar myos pa zhes bya ba yin no/_/rab tu phal che bar myos pa'i skyes bu rnams gal te nem zhing 'phar bar gyur pa'i nags su rtse dga' bar byed na/_sa de dag ni kA shi ltar dkar zhing 'jam pa dang shing bal 'dra bar gzhi mnan na nem la bteg na 
[\[201b.7\]]'phar ba yin no/_/ji skad du brjod pa'i me tog dang /_'bras bu dang /_ljon shing dang /_pad ma dang /_pad ma'i rdzing bu dang /_sgra sgrogs pa'i bung ba'i tshogs kyis gang bar gyur pa rnams ni nem zhing 'phar ba'i nags de la yang sngar gyi bzhin no/_/des byang phyogs sgra mi snyan 
[\[202a\]]
[\[202a.1\]]gyi ri gsum pa na [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]kyi sgra dul ba legs par mthong bar gyur pas kyang yang dag pa ji lta bar lus so sor rig par byed de sngar bzhin no/_/gzhan yang rnal 'byor spyod pa phyi rol gyi lus kyis lus la rjes su lta zhing gnas te/_gzhan yang byang phyogs sgra mi snyan na 
[\[202a.2\]]dga' bar gyur pa gzhan ci dmigs na/_des thos pa las byung ba'i shes rab kyis sam lha'i mig gis mthong bar gyur pa sprin dkar po rgyu ba zhes bya ba'i ri bo nye 'khor du dpag tshad stong yin no/_/shin tu dkar bar gyur pa'i dngul gyi rang bzhin yin te/_ri gang gi 'od zer gyis zla ba'i 'od 
[\[202a.3\]]kyang gsal bar mi 'gyur ro/_/dper na 'dzam bu'i gling du zla ba shar bar gyur pa na gza' dang /_rgyu skar dang /_skar phran gyi 'od kyang med par 'gyur ba de bzhin du sprin dkar po rgyu ba'i ris kyang zla ba'i 'od mi gsal bar byed do/_/sprin dkar po rgyu ba'i ri bo'i drung du yang skyes bu gang dag 
[\[202a.4\]]rab tu gnas par byed pa de dag rnams ni me tog gi phreng ba gyon pa zhes bya ba'i ming du 'gyur ro/_/skyes nas sprin dkar po rgyu ba'i ri bo la rtag tu rtse ba la ched cher byed pa rnams me tog gi ze 'bru gyon par gyur nas rtag tu glus dga' bar gyur pa dang /_rgyun du yang pad ma'i tshal rnams na 
[\[202a.5\]]mngon par dga' bar byed do/_/sdug gu dang bcas par gyur pa dang /_rab tu g.yo bar byed pa dang /_rnam par 'khrul pa dang /_rnam par 'khor ba dang /_rtag tu kun nas 'ching ba med pa rgyags pa dang /_rtag tu mya ngan dang rnam par bral ba rnams yin no/_/gzhan yang sprin dkar po 
[\[202a.6\]]rgyu ba'i ri de la nags 'di dag rnams yod do/_/'di lta ste/_rnga sgra 'byin pa'i sgra dang /_ngang ngur rnams kyis rjes su bsgrags par byed pa dang /_yid kyi rjes su 'thun pa dang /_chu sgra kun nas sgrogs pa dang rnams so/_/rnga sgra kun nas sgrogs pa'i nags su phreng ba thogs pa'i lha rnams 
[\[202a.7\]]kyis rnga sgra dag sgrogs par byed do/_/sgra snyan par gyur pa ni dper na 'dzam bu'i gling gi pi wang dang /_gling bu dang /_rnga pa Na ba dang /_dung gi sgra la chags par 'gyur ba yin la/_de bzhin du rnga sgra kun nas sgrogs pa'i nags na lha rnams rnga sgra sgrogs par byed pa yin no/_/de dag rnams 
[\[202b\]]
[\[202b.1\]]la ni 'dzam bu'i gling gi glu mkhan rnams kyis bcu drug gi char yang mi chog go/_/ji skad du bshad par gyur pa'i [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]dang /_bya dang /_pad ma dang /_ljon shing dang /_nags dang /_nye ba'i nags dang /_khrus kyi rdzing bu dang /_mtshe'u dang /_gser dang dngul gyi sa 
[\[202b.2\]]gzhi'i cha rnams dang /_'bab chu dang rnams kyi yon tan rnams ni de lta de ltar gyis rnga sgra sgrogs pa'i nags na yon tan rnams thams cad kyang yod pa ni sngar bzhin no/_/phreng ba gyon par gyur pa'i skyes bu rnams ni rnga sgra kun nas sgrogs par byed pa'i gdangs kyis rtag tu 'dod pa rnams 
[\[202b.3\]]la rnam par chags pa yin te/_dper na gzhong pa thogs pa'i lha rnams kyi dga' ba'i tshal gyi nye ba'i nags bzhin du rtag tu 'dod pa'i sgra dang ro dang gzugs dang dri rnams spyod par byed do/_/nags gnyis pa ngang ngur rnams kyis yongs su sgrogs par byed pa zhes bya ba ste/_nags de la ni ngang ngur rnams kyis yongs 
[\[202b.4\]]su sgrogs par byed pa dang pad ma'i rdzing bu rnams kyang brgya phrag rnams de nas stong phrag rnams yod do/_/de dag rnams kyi ni ming yang brjod cing gzung bar mi nus so/_/ngang ngur rnams kyis rjes su sgrogs pa'i nags la [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]kyi rigs 'di dag rnams yod pa ni 'di lta ste/_rnam par bkra ba'i bai nAHdang /_rin po 
[\[202b.5\]]che sna bdun gyis brgyan pa'i lus 'dul ba zhes bya ba'i [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]dang /_ku rang gA dang /_ma ka ra dang /_ma kA 'dod pa dang /_shin tu dga' ba dang /_sam bA bi naHdang /_rtse mo g.yo ba rnams 'dzin par byed pa dang /_khor yug gi mig dang /_kar ke ta'i lte ba dang /_gser gyi 
[\[202b.6\]]rwa dang /_logs dngul gyi logs dang /_rlung gi shugs dang /_shing gi rtsa ba na rgyu ba dang /_chu'i sgra 'bab par 'gro bar byed pa dang /_nags kyi phreng bar bgrang ba dang /_bi dru ma'i lus dang /_lag+na'i logs dang /_lto ltir ba dang /_bar po tAHdang /_shang sha rA NAHdang /_pags 
[\[202b.7\]]pa nag po dang /_rtsa ba'i 'od dang /_lang tsho la bab pa dang /_shin tu 'jam pa dang /_dkar po'i tshogs dang rnams yin te/_de dag rnams ni [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]kyi rigs nyi shu rtsa lnga yin no/_/phreng ba gyon pa'i skyes bu rnams dang lhan cig tu rtse dga' bar byed de/_rang gi las dang 'dra bar 
[\[203a\]]
[\[203a.1\]]gyur pa rnam pa sna tshogs pa rnams nyams su myong bar byed do/_/sprin dkar po rgyu ba'i ri la yid kyi rjes su 'thun pa zhes bya ba'i nags yod do/_/nags de nas ni phreng ba gyon pa'i mi rnams kyi yid kyi rjes su 'thun par gyur pa gang dang gang dag yin pa de dag rnams nyid ljon shing rnams 
[\[203a.2\]]las 'thob par 'gyur ro/_/nags dang nye ba'i nags rnams gang dag yin pa thams cad kyang dga' ba rnams yin te sngar bzhin no/_/sprin dkar po rgyu ba'i ri bo la nags bzhi pa chu'i sgra kun nas sgrogs pa zhes bya ba yod do/_/de la ni rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i gzugs 'dzin par gyur 
[\[203a.3\]]pa'i rig pa 'dzin pa rnams rtse bar byed do/_/yang gang gi tshe rdul gyis gnod par gyur pa na de'i tshe rang 'dod pa'i cha byad kyis chur 'jug ste/_chu la kun tu 'phyo bar byed do/_/de la rig pa 'dzin pa'i rigs 'di dag rnams yod de/_'di lta ste/_bde ba la chags pa'i shugs dang /_
[\[203a.4\]]'gor ba med par 'gro ba dang /_nam mkha'i stobs dang /_sprin rab tu 'byed par byed pa dang /_nyi ma'i lam du legs par rgyu ba dang /[ {]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]kyi 'gros dang /_pau rwaHdang /_shin tu dud pa dang /_ku shi kAHdang /_ri rnams la kun tu chags pa dang /_rtag tu myos pa'i dri 
[\[203a.5\]]dang /_nam mkha' la rgyu bar byed pa dang /_mA ShA Da'i nang na gnas pa dang /_tsi mi sha'i phug na rgyu ba dang /_rtag pa'i shugs dang /_ngang pa'i shing rta dang /_glang po'i shing rta dang /_glog 'khyug par byed pa dang /_ma la ya na gnas pa dang /_ke ta ka'i phreng ba mchog dang ldan 
[\[203a.6\]]pa dang /_bud med la sred pa dang /_chang pa rnams kyis btung ba dang /_ri rab lhun po la gnas pa dang /_kun tu khyab pa'i zhen pa dang /_rtag tu dga' ba dang /_me tog gi phreng ba 'phyang ba dang /_sa gzhi la rgyu ba dang /_sngags gsang ba pa dang rnams te/_de dag ni rig pa 'dzin 
[\[203a.7\]]pa'i rigs sum cu rtsa gnyis yin la/_sprin dkar po rgyu ba'i ri'i chu sgra nas sgrogs pa'i nags de nyid la gnas nas dga' bar byed do/_/rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i rgyan rnams kyis rab tu brgyan cing rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i rgod pa dang 'gying ba dang rtse ba dang /_kun tu spyod par yang byed de/_de'i 
[\[203b\]]
[\[203b.1\]]las kyi mthus yin no/_/de 'dra bar gyur pa'i bud med dang lhan cig tu zhen par byed do/_/de ltar sprin dkar po 'dzin pa'i nags dang nye ba'i nags dang bcas pa rnams thams cad kyang yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du so sor rig par byed de/_sprin dkar po 'dzin pa'i ri bo 'di la gcig 
[\[203b.2\]]tu nges par gyur pa dang /_rtag pa dang /_brtan pa dang /_ther zug dang /_mya ngan las 'das par 'gro ba thob pa'i bde ba yod dam zhe na/_des rtag pa dang /_brtan pa dang /_ther zug dang /_yongs su mi 'gyur ba'i chos can du gyur pa'i bde ba ni gcig kyang ma mthong ste ji 
[\[203b.3\]]ltar nyi ma la mun pa bzhin no/_/de ltar 'jig rten pa'i bde ba rnams kyang myang bar mngar ba dang /_rnam par smin pa rtsub pa dang /_kun nas nyon mongs pa can du gyur pa dang /_sred pa las nges par 'byung ba ma yin pa dang /_'bras bu rtsub pa yin te/_kim pa ka'i 'bras bu 
[\[203b.4\]]'dra ba dug dang /_mtshon dang /_me dang mtshungs par gyur pa dang /_dus de tsam du dga' bar gyur pa yin no/_/gar mkhan gyi tshon rtsi bzhin du yud tsam cig dga' ba yin no/_/glog dang mtshungs par shin tu g.yo ba yin no/_/ri'i 'bab chu'i shugs dang 'dra ba dang /_nye bar 
[\[203b.5\]]'tshe ba dang bcas pa dang /_dri za'i grong khyer dang mtshungs par slu bar byed pa dang /_skye bo rnams thams cad kyang rnam par 'joms par byed pa dang /_shing tog rnams thams cad bzhin du ci nas kyang ltung bar 'gyur bar mtshungs pa dang /_dug gi zas dang 'dra bar yongs su smin 
[\[203b.6\]]par 'gyur ba dang /_spu gri'i so'i myang ba bzhin du shin tu rno ba dang /_lan brgya stong du ma rnams su yang slu bar byed pa yin pa dang /_chu klung gi 'gram gyi shing bzhin du nges pa kho nar ltung bar 'gyur bar mtshungs pa yin no/_/rnam pa de lta bu'i 'dod pa rnams la kun tu bltas par 
[\[203b.7\]]gyur nas rnal 'byor spyod pa pa nges par skyo ba skye bar 'gyur ro/_/yang ji lta ba bzhin du mthong bar gyur pa dang /_tshul bzhin yid la byed pa mthong ba dang ldan zhing rnam par byang bar gyur pa'i mthong ba dang yang dag par ldan par 'gyur ro/_/gzhan yang rnal 'byor spyod pa phyi rol gyi 
[\[204a\]]
[\[204a.1\]]lus kyis lus la rjes su lta zhing gnas te/_byang phyogs sgra mi snyan na dga' bar gyur pa'i [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]kyi rigs yod dam zhe na/_des thos pa las byung ba'i shes rab kyis sam lha'i mig gis mthong bar gyur pa mtho bar brtsegs pa zhes bya ba'i ri dpag tshad stong yod pa yin te/_
[\[204a.2\]]nye 'khor rnams dga' bar gyur pa dang 'od kyi phreng ba dang ldan pa yin no/_/de la shing gi rigs ni 'di dag rnams yod de/_'di lta ste/_bai DUr+ya'i 'dab ma dang /_gser 'bar ba'i sdong bu dang /_byi ru'i 'dab ma can rnams dang /_dngul gyi sdong bu dang /_gser gyi 'dab ma dang ldan pa mar 
[\[204a.3\]]me'i gong bu rtsa brgyad 'dra ba rnams yin no/_/ri rnam pa du ma dang shing gi rigs gzhan dag rnams dang /_pad ma'i rigs rnams dang /_skyed mos tshal gyi rigs rnams dang /[ {]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]kyi rigs rnams dang /_ri'i rtse mo'i rigs rnam pa du ma rnams kyang sngar bzhin no/_/mtho 
[\[204a.4\]]bar brtsegs pa'i yan lag gi brtsegs pa'i rgyar ni dpag tshad nyis brgya'o/_/de'i brtsegs pa gcig la ri rab lhun po la gnas pa'i phreng ba thogs pa zhes bya ba'i lha dang pi wang gsum pa zhes bya ba'i lha rnams rtse dga' bar byed do/_/pi wang gsum pa'i lha ni lhun po'i bang rim btang 
[\[204a.5\]]bar gyur nas mtho bar brtsegs pa'i ri la rtse dga' bar byed de/_ri bo de dga' bar gyur pa'i phyir ro/_/mthon po de'i yan lag gi brtsegs pa'i nye 'khor rnams ni rin po che'i rang bzhin yin te/_'phang du ni dpag tshad lnga bcu yin no/_/brtsegs ma lnga yod pa'i yan lag gi brtsegs 
[\[204a.6\]]pa'i rgyar ni dpag tshad nyis brgya yin no/_/de la brtsegs ma gcig ni gser la nor bu'i khrod yin te/_rin po che rnams thams cad kyang khrod de las skye bar 'gyur ro/_/'di lta ste/_bi dru ma dang /_byi ru dang /_bai DUr+ya dang /_mu sa ra galba dang /_shel dang /_pad ma rA ga dang /_
[\[204a.7\]]su ku mA ri kA dang /_in+d+ra nI la dang /_nI la chen po dang /_ma btags pa'i gos kyang 'byung ngo /_/gnyis pa ni dngul gyi rang bzhin yin te/_dngul gyi ljon shing rnams phun sum tshogs pa go shiR+Sha zhes bya ba'i tsan dan skye ba yin no/_/lha dang lha ma yin gyi 'khrug pa gang yin pa lha rnams 
[\[204b\]]
[\[204b.1\]]dang /_lha ma yin rnams lhan cig tu g.yul bkye bar gyur pas mtshon gyis rmas pa rnams dang lhan cig tu 'gyel bar gyur pa rnams nyid kyi lha rnams kyi lus nad med par byed pa yin no/_/go shiR+Sha pa zhes bya ba ni ri de'i lhan cig skyes pa'i ming yin no/_/de'i tsan dan yang go shiR+Sha pa'i 
[\[204b.2\]]ming yin no/_/ri'i rtse mo gsum pa ni lha'i bu mo dga' ba zhes bya ba yin te/_gang la lha'i bu mo rnams rtse dga' bar byed pa/_nags dang nye ba'i nags rnams dang /_gser dang /_dngul dang /_baiDUr+ya rnams kyis ze 'bru dang gzhi 'jam po rnams la rtag tu rten par byed pa dang /_
[\[204b.3\]]rab tu dga' bar gyur pas rgod pa dang /_rol pa dang /_rtse bar byed pas rnam par gyur pa'i dga' ba rnams la sred pas rnam par bslad par gyur pa'i byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams dam pa'i chos nyan pa la kha phyir phyogs par 'gyur zhing rtag tu 'dod pa la rnam par chags par gyur pas rwa 
[\[204b.4\]]de'i rtse la rtag tu 'khod par byed do/_/rwa bzhi pa ni gang la rgyal po chen po bzhi rgun 'bru'i nags dang nye ba'i nags rnams la rtse dga' bar byed pa yin no/_/de la yang rtag tu myos pa'i [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]dang /_bya dang /_gsang ba pa'i lha dang /_rig pa 'dzin pa dang /_mi rnams dang /_nye 
[\[204b.5\]]'khor rnams na yang rgun 'bru'i chu klung rnams rab tu 'bab pa yin no/_/kha cig ni sbrang rtsi'i ro yin no/_/kha cig ni bdug pa ma yin pa dang ldan pa'i ro yin no/_/kha cig ni 'dres par gyur pa'i ro ste/_rwa de la ni chu klung gi 'gram rnams las gser sa le sbram skye'o/_/ba lang dang /_
[\[204b.6\]]ma he Sha dang /_phag pa dang /_glang po che dang /_ce spyang dang /_rnga mo dang /_phyugs dang /_spyang ku dang /_klu dang /_gung dang /_seng ge dang /_dred dang /_wa dang /_bya dang /_de dang de dag rnams dang 'dra bar gyur pa'i gzugs rnams dang /_kha dog du mar gyur pa'i 
[\[204b.7\]]rin po che'i rang bzhin phal che ba rnams mthong ngo /_/gang gi phyir gang la gser sa le sbram rnams skye bar 'gyur ba ni ri'i rtse mo de'i klus gser sa le sbram 'di dag rnams yin no/_/brtsegs ma lnga pa gang la gser gyi 'dab ma dang /_bai DUr+ya'i yu ba can shin tu 'jam par gyur pa'i 
[\[205a\]]
[\[205a.1\]]pad ma rnams skye'o/_/nye 'khor kun nas yang bai DUr+ya'i ljon shing rnams kyis gang ba yin no/_/de la pad ma'i rdzing bu 'di dag rnams yod do/_/'di lta ste/_kun dga' ra ba'i rgyas pa dang /_pad mas khyab par gyur pa dang /_pad ma dus su rgyu ba dang /_pad ma dmar 
[\[205a.2\]]pos kun tu khyab pa dang /_nyi ma sten pa dang /_gzhi 'jam pa dang /_mi g.yo ba dang /_ljon shing dang /_zab pa dang /_me tog dri zhim pa 'byung ba dang /_brtan pa'i chu dang ste/_de dag rnams ni pad ma'i rdzing bu bcu gcig yin no/_/rwa de'i ming yang pad mas kun tu khyab pa zhes bya ba 
[\[205a.3\]]yin no/_/chu klung rnams kyang rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i dri dang ros legs par gang bar gyur pa rnams nye 'khor rnams na 'bab ste/_ro drug dang ldan pa yin no/_/'dod pa'i ljon shing rnams thams cad dang /_nye bar skyes pa dang /_ljon shing dang /_me tog dang /_chu bo dang /_khrus 
[\[205a.4\]]kyi rdzing bu dang ldan pa rnams ni snga ma bzhin no/_/des rwa lnga pa la kun tu bltas par gyur pas kyang yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du phyi rol gyi lus la kun nas lta bar byed do/_/des byang phyogs sgra mi snyan pa rnams kyi ri lnga pa mtho bar brtsegs pa zhes bya ba la mngon par bltas par gyur pas kyang 
[\[205a.5\]]yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du phyi rol gyi lus so sor reg par byed do/_/gzhan yang rnal 'byor spyod pa las dang chos dag gi rnam par smin pa'i dbang du byas nas mthon por brtsegs pa'i ri la kun tu lta ste/_sems can 'di dag rnams ni las kyi chos kyi rnam par smin pa can yin te/_rang gi 
[\[205a.6\]]las kyi bgo skal la spyod par byed pa dang /_rang gi las rnams brtan par byas pa dang /_rang gis legs par byas pa rnams kyis ni 'dir skyes pa yin la/_rang gi las de dag zad par gyur nas nges par ltung bar 'gyur te/_mi dge ba'i las rnams kyis ni dmyal ba dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]dang /_
[\[205a.7\]]dud 'gro rnams su 'gyur ro/_/legs par byas pa rnams kyis ni lha dang mi rnams kyi nang du'o/_/mtho bar brtsegs pa'i ri'i nye 'khor na gang dag gnas pa de dag rnams ni bde ba la dga' ba zhes bya ba yin no/_/bde ba la dga' ba'i skyes bu rnams ni rtag tu 'dod pa la mngon par dga' 
[\[205b\]]
[\[205b.1\]]ba rnams yin te/_rtag tu 'dod pa rnams kyis ngoms pa med pa rnams yin no/_/'di ltar tshigs su bcad pa/_me la bud shing rnams dang ni/_/rgya mtsho la ni chu bo ltar/_/sred ldan 'dod pas ngoms pa med/_/de phyir 'dod pa zhi ba min/_/zhes bya ba yin te/_'di na sems 
[\[205b.2\]]can 'di dag rnams ni nges pa kho nar ngu bar bya ba la dga' bar byed pa yin par rnal 'byor pa des dri ma dang rnam par bral ba'i mig gis mthong ngo /_/de dag rnams kyis ni shes pa yang ma yin te/_'dus byas 'di dag rnams thams cad ni sdug bsngal gyi bdag nyid yin no/_/thams cad 
[\[205b.3\]]kyang 'dzad cing 'gog pa'i chos can yin no/_/snying po med pa dang sgron ma med pa yin no/_/'di dag rnams la ni mthar thug pa'i bde ba yod pa ma yin no/_/shis pa ma yin zhing zhi ba yang ma yin no/_/sems can 'di dag rnams thams cad kyi srog dang /_lang tsho dang /_
[\[205b.4\]]nad med pa dang /_phun sum tshogs pa dang /_'di dag rnams thams cad kyang bde ba ma yin zhing gtsang ba ma yin la mi rtag pa/_bdag med pa snying po med pa dbu ba rdos pa dang /_chu'i chu bur lta bu yin te/_gson pa rnams ni thams cad kyang 'chi ba'i mthar thug par 'gyur ba 
[\[205b.5\]]yin la/_phun sum tshogs pa rnams thams cad kyang rgud pa'i mthar thug par 'gyur ba yin no/_/gnas de dag rnams ni dmyal ba dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]dang /_dud 'gro dang /_mi rnams mi slu ba'i yin te/_dper na ji ltar nyi ma shar bar gyur pa de ni nges par nub par 'gyur ba yin 
[\[205b.6\]]no/_/de kho na bzhin du skyes pa rnams ni nges par 'chi bar bya ba yin no/_/yang ji lta ji ltar sa gzhi gzhon zhing lang tsho la bab par gyur na/_ljon shing dang /_nags dang /_nye ba'i nags dang /_ne'u gsing dang bcas par 'gyur ro/_/sa gzhi de rnyings par gyur na ljon shing 
[\[205b.7\]]dang /_nags dang /_nye ba'i nags dang /_mtshe'u dang /_pad ma dang bcas pa rnams kyang de ltar 'gyur ro/_/de kho na bzhin du sos ka'i dus su lang tsho la bab pa rnams ston ka'i dus su rnyings par 'gyur ba dang /_gzhon pa rnams thams cad kyang rgas pa'i mthar thug par 
[\[206a\]]
[\[206a.1\]]'gyur ba 'di byang phyogs sgra mi snyan pa'i mi rnams kyis go ba yang ma yin no/_/yang ji lta ji ltar mtshan mo char bab par gyur na chu klung rnams phun sum tshogs par 'gyur te/_char bab pa'i dbang gis ngos gnyi gar yang mang du 'bab par 'gyur ro/_/phun sum 
[\[206a.2\]]tshogs par gyur pa rnams kyang ston ka zad pa dang 'grib pa'i sgo nas chu chung bar 'gyur ro/_/de kho na bzhin du dbyar gyi mtshan mo char 'bab par gyur pa dang mtshungs pa ni phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin no/_/dbyar gyi char 'gags par gyur nas ston gyi dus na chu klung rnams zad cing 
[\[206a.3\]]'grib pa'i sgo dang mtshungs pa ni rgud pa rnams yin no/_/'di lta ste/_phyi rol gyi dngos po pad ma rnams kyang sos ka'i dus su rgyas par 'gyur zhing nad med pa dang /_bung ba rnams kyis kyang sten par byed do/_/dgun gyi dus na ni kha ba dang bad dag gis bung ba rnams kyang na bas mi 
[\[206a.4\]]sten no/_/sos ka'i dus kyi pad ma de kho na bzhin du nad med pa yin no/_/dgun gyi dus dang mtshungs par gyur pa ni nad med pa ma yin pa'o/_/dgun gyi dus na nad med pa ma yin pas bung ba rnams dang mtshungs pa ni phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin no/_/de bzhin du sems can 'di 
[\[206a.5\]]dag rnams kyang sred pas shin tu rnam par nyams par gyur nas bdag nyid kyi rgud pa rnams ni gtan rig par mi 'gyur ro/_/des mtho bar brtsegs pa'i ri'i nags dang /_nye ba'i nags dang /_ljon shing dang /_'bab chu dang /_khrus kyi rdzing bu dang /_ne'u gsing dang /_rig pa 
[\[206a.6\]]'dzin pa dang /[ {]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]dang /_bya dang /_ri khrod dang /_chu gshal dang bcas pa rnams la legs par bltas par gyur pas kyang yang dag par ji lta ba bzhin du phyi rol la yang dag par lta bar byed do/_/gzhan yang rnal 'byor spyod pa phyi rol gyi lus kyis lus la rjes su lta zhing 
[\[206a.7\]]gnas pa na/_des thos pa las byung ba'i shes rab kyis sam lha'i mig gis byang phyogs sgra mi snyan na dga' ba dang /_dga' ba'i rigs su gyur pa dang /_dga' bar gyur pa ri'i phreng ba 'dzin pa zhes bya ba gzhan yod pa mthong ngo /_/ri bo de ni rnam par bkra ba'i phreng ba rnams 'dzin pa yin 
[\[206b\]]
[\[206b.1\]]pas dmar po dang /_sngon po dang /_dkar po dang /_mthing ga dang /_ser po dang /_rnam pa sna tshogs rnams 'dres pa'i mdog gi kha dog dang yang ldan pa'i ljon shing gi rigs rnams yod do/_/'di lta ste/_sta ba ka'i shing dang /_mya ngan med dang /_gser gyi lo ma dang ldan pa 
[\[206b.2\]]dang /_'khri shing dang /_shing gel pas g.yogs par gyur pa rnams so/_/'di lta ste/_shin tu grol bar gyur pa'i 'khri shing rnams dang /_dga' ba'i lo ma dang rlung gi shugs kyis rab tu g.yo ba'i lo ma rnams so/_/'di lta ste/_shing ni tsu la dang /_bai DUr+ya'i 'dab ma dang /_
[\[206b.3\]]chu la skyes pa dang rnams so/_/'di lta ste/_brgya la cung zad dang bi dru ma'i 'dab ma dang nyi ma mthong bas dga' bar 'gyur ba rnams so/_/'di lta ste/_ti la kA sa dang zla ba'i 'od kyis dga' ba dang rnams so/_/'di lta ste/_ku mu da'i tshogs dang nyi ma 'pho ba dang rnams so/_/
[\[206b.4\]]'di lta ste/_dus su 'dod pa dang zla ba phyed pa dang bcas pa na dga' ba rnams so/_/'di lta ste/_ud pa la mtshan mo dga' ba'o/_/'di lta ste/_ban+d+hu dzI bi ka dang de'i rjes thogs la 'bras bu 'byung ba dag go/_/'di lta ste/_a mra dang du ba'i dris lhag pas bsgos pa dag go/_/
[\[206b.5\]]'di lta ste/_mya ngan med sngon po dang reg par bzod pa dag go/_/'di lta ste/_kun+dA dang shin tu 'jam pa dang rnams so/_/'di lta ste/_shi rI ShAH_dang gom pa bor bar bzod pa dag go/_/'di lta ste/_sems pa dang dro bas dga' bar 'gyur ba'i dri'o/_/'di lta ste/_kung+ku 
[\[206b.6\]]ma dang /_ku su mA dang /_yul gzhan du rnam par rgyu ba rnams so/_/'di lta ste/_ko bi da rA dang bzang po mthong ba dag go/_/'di lta ste/_yid bde ba dang lha'i skye bo rnams dga' ba'o/_/'di lta ste/_nI la ud pa la dang /_pad ma dang /_pad ma mtsho skyes dang /_dus thams 
[\[206b.7\]]cad kyi me tog can rnams so/_/'di lta ste/_seng+ge swa brAH_dang ka dam+ba dga' ba dag go/_/'di lta ste/_chus dga' bar 'gyur ba dang rkang pa'i mthil gyis brgyab pas me tog 'byung ba'o/_/'di lta ste/_mya ngan med dang rang bzhin gyis dri dang kha dog rnams dga' bar gyur pa'o/_/
[\[207a\]]
[\[207a.1\]]'di lta ste/_a Da ka dang ste/_de ltar de dag rnams ni ji ltar gtso bor gyur pa'i ljon shing me tog gis phyug pa rnams yongs su bsgrags pa yin te/_me tog gi ljon shing gi rigs nyi shu rtsa gnyis yin no/_/phreng ba 'dzin pa'i ri bo'i nye 'khor rnams na phan tshun 
[\[207a.2\]]du bskyod pas lo 'dab rnams 'khril bar 'gyur ba'i ljon shing rnams yin no/_/bung ba'i rigs kyi tshogs rnams kyis nye bar gang ba yin te/_bung ba de dag rnams kyang la la bai DUr+ya'i mdog yin no/_/la la ni gser gyi mdog yin no/_/kha cig ni dngul gyi mdog tu rnam par snang ngo /_/
[\[207a.3\]]kha cig ni gur gum gyi mdog go/_/kha cig ni sngon po'o/_/kha cig ni rnam par 'dres par gyur pa'o/_/kha cig ni mtsho la rgyu ba'o/_/kha cig ni ljon shing la rgyu ba'o/_/kha cig ni shing gel ba la rgyu ba'o/_/kha cig ni thams cad la rgyu ba'o/_/bya rnams kyang kha cig ni 
[\[207a.4\]]gser 'bar ba'i lus la dngul gyi mdog gi sgro'o/_/kha cig ni dngul gyi lus la gser gyi sgro'o/_/kha cig ni bi dru ma'i lus la bai DUr+ya'i sgro'o/_/kha cig ni bai DUr+ya dang 'dra bar gyur pa'i lus la in+d+ra nI la'i sgro rnams so/_/kha cig ni shel gyi mdog gi lus la sgro rnams gser 
[\[207a.5\]]gyi sgro'i rang bzhin no/_/kha cig ni rin po che gsum gyi lus su gyur pa 'di lta ste/_lus ni gser gyi mdog go/_/sgro rnams ni dngul gyi mdog go/_/rgyab ni bai DUr+ya'i mdog go/_/kha cig ni rin po che bdun gyi mdog gi bya rnams la 'di lta ste/_in+d+ra nI la dang /_ma ra ka ta 
[\[207a.6\]]dang /_shel dang /_mu sa ra galba dang /_bi dru ma dang /_su ku mA ri kA dang /_pad+ma ra ga'i mdog rnams so/_/de ltar rang gi las kyis rnam par bkra ba'i lus can rnams yin te/_gzugs rnam pa du mar gyur pa'i bung ba rnams dang bya rnams kyang rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i sgro dang ldan 
[\[207a.7\]]pa dang rjes su 'thun pa rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i skad rjod par byed pa yin no/_/las sna tshogs pa rnams kyi lus rnam par bkra bar gyur pa yin no/_/kha dog dang dri dang phreng ba dang ldan pa'i me tog du ma rnams 'byung ba yang 'di lta ste/_gzugs du ma rnams yin no/_/skyes bu rnams 
[\[207b\]]
[\[207b.1\]]kyis rang gis las byas par gyur pa'i rang bzhin ji lta ba bzhin no/_/ljon shing rnams kyang gzugs dang dri sna tshogs pa yin zhing /_byang phyogs sgra mi snyan pa rnams kyi dbang gis shing rgyan rgyu dang /_rdo ba dang /_chu klung dang /_khrus kyi rdzing bu rnams kyang rnam pa du mar dga' 
[\[207b.2\]]bar gyur pa dang /_yid la smon pa bzhin du rnam par bkra ba yin te/_sngon legs par byas pa'i las rnams kyi rgyu mtshan gyis rin po che rnams dang yang ldan pa dang /_zas skom gyi chu bo rnams kyis rnam par brgyan pa dang /_ljon shing dga' bar gyur pa dang /_sa'i nye 'khor 
[\[207b.3\]]gyi cha de dang de dag rnams la byang phyogs sgra mi snyan pa'i skyes bu rnams rtse dga' bar byed do/_/phreng ba 'dzin pa'i ri'i nye 'khor rnams na rab tu gnas pa'i skyes bu gang yin pa de dag rnams la rtag tu 'gying bag can zhes bya ba'i ming 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/phreng ba 'dzin pa'i nye 'khor 
[\[207b.4\]]rnams la skyes bu gang dag 'gying bag can yin te/_ji ltar yongs 'du sa brtol gyi rtsa ba na lha rnams kyi dbyar zla ba bzhi po rnams ma gtogs pa dang /_lha rnams la mig 'dzums pa med pa dang /_sha dang /_rus pa dang /_chu ser dang /_pags pa med pa rnams dang 'di dag 
[\[207b.5\]]rnams ma gtogs pa lha rnams dang byang phyogs sgra mi snyan gyi skyes bu rtag tu 'gying bag can rnams ni thams cad kyang mtshungs pa yin no/_/gzhan yang rnal 'byor spyod pa pa las dang chos la yang dag par kun tu lta bar byed de/_sems can de dag rnams ni rgyags pa rnam pa gsum gyis 
[\[207b.6\]]rgyags par gyur nas legs par spyod pa rnams spyod par mi byed do/_/'di lta ste/_gzugs kyis rgyags pa dang /_lang tsho'i rgyags pa dang /_gson pa'i rgyags pa rnams kyis rgyags par gyur pa'i phyir na/_lus kyis legs par spyad pa rnams mi spyod do/_/ngag gis legs 
[\[207b.7\]]par spyad pa rnams mi spyod do/_/yid kyis legs par spyad pa rnams mi spyod do/_/legs par byas pa'i las kyi lhag ma rnams kyis lha rnams su skye'o/_/lha'i 'jig rten de las shi 'phos par gyur nas dmyal ba dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]dang /_dud 'gro dang /_mi rnams su skye bar 
[\[208a\]]
[\[208a.1\]]'gyur te/_gang gi phyir sred pa ni dug gi mchog zas dang 'dres pa yin pa'i phyir sems can rnams la mchog tu rtsub pa dang /_mchog tu 'ching ba dang /_mchog tu nyam nga ba yin no/_/des bcings pa'i phyir na sems can 'di dag rnams kyis ni nges pa kho nar 
[\[208a.2\]]sngon gyi mtha' dang /_phyi ma'i mtha' dag kun tu mi shes pa yin no/_/mngar ba'i mchog tu gyur pa la 'bras bu rtsub pa'i 'dod pa rnams thams cad ni kim pa ka smin pa dang 'dra ba dang /_sa 'og gi zhags pa dang 'dra ba yin pa de dag sems can gyis ma rig go/_/g.yang sa 
[\[208a.3\]]dang 'dra ba dang /_thams cad kyang rnam par 'bral ba dang /_'chi ba'i sdug bsngal dang /_sdug bsngal rnams la yang dpe med pa yin no/_/ri chen po'i 'bab chu'i shugs ltar g.yo ba yin pas lang tsho yang 'di na rtag pa ma yin te/_brtan pa dang yongs su mi 'gyur ba'i chos 
[\[208a.4\]]can gyis gnas skabs gcig kyang 'gro ba lnga na yod pa ma yin no/_/'di ltar nyes pa byas pa las kyi 'khor lo'i rlung gis yang dang yang 'khor bar gyur du zin kyang srog chags 'di dag rnams ni skyo ba yang skye bar mi 'gyur ro/_/phreng ba 'dzin pa'i ri dang nye 'khor gyi skyes bu rtag tu 
[\[208a.5\]]'gying bag can rnams la yang yang dag par bltas par gyur pas kyang yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du phyi rol gyi lus la lta bar byed do/_/gzhan yang rnal 'byor spyod pa phyi rol gyi lus kyis lus la rjes su lta zhing gnas te/_byang phyogs sgra mi snyan na ri'i rigs su gyur pa'am/_chu 
[\[208a.6\]]klung gi rigs su gyur pa'am/_khrus kyi rdzing bu'i rigs su gyur pa gang yin pa de dag dga' ba dang /_shin tu dga' ba dang /_mchog tu dga' bar gyur pa gzhan gang dag ce na/_des thos pa las byung ba'i shes rab kyis sam lha'i mig gis mthong bar gyur pa/_byang phyogs sgra mi snyan na shin 
[\[208a.7\]]tu dga' bar gyur pa'i ri'i rigs gzhan dag kyang yod do/_/'di lta ste/_dus na dga' ba zhes bya ba'i ri bo rgyar dpag tshad stong yod pa mthor dpag tshad sum cu par gyur pa'o/_/de la yang dus drug po 'di dag rnams nyid rtag tu nye bar gnas pa yin te/_'di lta ste/_dgun stod dang /_
[\[208b\]]
[\[208b.1\]]dgun smad dang /_sos ka dang /_dpyid ka dang /_dbyar dang /_ston la sogs pa'o/_/ri de la yul phyogs 'di dag dang /_dgun stod ni gang dag yin zhing /_de la yang dgun stod skye ba'i ljon shing gi me tog rab tu rgyas pa gang rnams yin na/_de la dgun stod skye ba'i 
[\[208b.2\]]ljon shing gi rigs rnams ni 'di lta ste/_sa ri shAng+ga na dang /_khro ba dang /_bad kyis rgas pa dang /_bung ba bgrod par byed pa dang /_de nges par dri zhim pa dang /_myu gu med pa dang /_tsakra bA kAs rjes su sgra sgrogs pa dang /_mchog tu dga' bar 'gyur ba'i me tog dang /_
[\[208b.3\]]glu phun sum tshogs pa dang /_zab mor skyes pa dang /_ni tAn+taM dang /_mchog tu khro ba dang /_nyi ma dang bcas pa dang /_me tog bco lnga po de dag rnams ni dgun stod kyi dus su ste/_dgun stod skye ba rnams yin no/_/dus na dga' ba'i ri bo'i yul phyogs gnyis pa la ni 
[\[208b.4\]]dgun smad kyi dus su 'byung ba rnams yin no/_/de la me tog gi rigs 'di dag rnams dus su dga' ba'i ri la dgun smad kha 'bye ba yin te/_byang phyogs sgra mi snyan pa'i ri la byang phyogs sgra mi snyan pa rnams kyi dbang gi 'bras bu yin no/_/dus na dga' ba'i ri bo'i yul phyogs 
[\[208b.5\]]gzhan la ni sos ka'i dus su 'byung bar 'gyur te/_de la me tog gi rigs ni 'di dag rnams yin no/_/'di lta ste/_shin tu kha bye ba dang /_pad ma dang /_ku ra ba kaM dang /_dri mang ba dang /_bung ba 'khor ba dang /_sa ma ma ta dang /_mya ngan med dang /_kiM shu ka dang /_mya ngan 
[\[208b.6\]]med sngon po dang /_'grib pa med pa'i dri dang /_ku mu da dang /_a mre De kang dang /_klung du skye ba dang ldan pa dang /_ni tsi ta dang /_la mra dang /_pAn+ti kaM dang /_me tog la bya dga' ba dang /_rtag tu me tog kha 'bye ba dang /_'dab ma stong pa dang rnams yin no/_/nyi shu po 
[\[208b.7\]]'di dag rnams ni sos ka'i dus su yin te/_yu ti ka dang dus su rgyu ba'i me tog gi rigs rnams kyang yin no/_/dus su dga' ba'i ri'i yul phyogs gzhan la ni dpyid kyi me tog gi rigs 'di dag rnams 'byung ngo /_/'di lta ste/_tsam+pa ka dang /_su ma na saHdang /_gser gyi yu 
[\[209a\]]
[\[209a.1\]]ti ka dang /_dus na rgyu ba dang /_du bas grol ba'i dri dang /_pad ma dang /_bung ba gnas pa dang /_pa sa saM dang /_shI ta ti dang /_a mra dang /_dri mnyam pa dang /_dri rtag pa dang /_zangs kyi ro dang /_rlung gis 'debs pa dang /_'dab ma brgya pa dang /_
[\[209a.2\]]ta ma'i ro dang /_nyi ma phyed pa dang /_tsu lwa lan dang /_ti la'i dngos po'i mdog dang /_byis pa'i me tog dang /_dza ti lwa dang rnams te/_me tog gi rigs nyi shu po de dag rnams ni dpyid kyi dus na 'byung ste/_byang phyogs sgra mi snyan pa rnams kyi legs par byas pa'i las kyi 
[\[209a.3\]]dbang gis dus na dga' ba'i ri bo la dpyid kyi dus na yin no/_/dus na dga' ba'i ri'i sa phyogs gzhan dag rnams la ni dbyar gyi me tog 'di dag rnams 'byung ste/_'di ltar yang ke ta ka dang /_ku Ta dzang dang /_brgya 'gro ba dang /_sa la 'gying zhing dga' bar gyur pa dang /_da ri'i 
[\[209a.4\]]phreng ba dang /_rdo las skyes pa dang /_ka da m+pa la dga' ba dang /_ngang pa 'khor ba dang /_me tog dri zhim pos dga' ba dang /_zangs kyi ro dang /_sa li la dang /_tsan+d+rA di kA dang /_klung du skyes pa dang /_rtse mo mthong ba dang rnams te/_ston kyang me tog gi rigs nyi shu po de 
[\[209a.5\]]dag rnams 'byung ba yin no/_/de la dus na dga' ba'i ri bo la de ltar de dag rnams dus drug tu yin zhing nye 'khor rnams na yang dus kyi 'khor lo ste/_de dus de dag rnams kyis de srid du byang phyogs sgra mi snyan rtag pa kho nar dga' bar gyur pa'i me tog dang /_'bras bu dang /_dru ma'i 
[\[209a.6\]]'bras bu dang /_ljon shing dang /_khrus kyi rdzing bu dang /_chu klung gi ngos rnams kyis kyang dus su dga' ba'i ri bo de ltar dga' bar gyur pa yin no/_/de bzhin du gzhan dag rnams kyang dus rnams la de ltar yin pa ni sngar bzhin no/_/dus na dga' ba'i ri'i nye 'khor na gnas par 'gyur 
[\[209a.7\]]ba'i skyes bu de dag rnams ni da ri ring ba zhes bya ba'i ming du 'gyur ro/_/gzhan yang rnal 'byor spyod pa las kyi chos la kun tu lta bar byed de/_ji ltar sems can 'di dag rnams sngon legs par byas pa rnams zad par byed pa yin pa dang /_gsar pa rnams kyang mi byed pa yin la/_
[\[209b\]]
[\[209b.1\]]de dag rnams ni so sor mngon par shes pa yang ma yin no/_/ji ltar dus tshod kyi 'khor lo rnams 'khor bar gyur pa'i dus na skyes bu 'di dag rnams kyi tshe kun nas gcod par byed pa yin no/_/dus kyi mes tshe'i shing rnams sreg par byed do/_/dus kyi rdo rjes tshe'i lo tog rnams 'joms 
[\[209b.2\]]par byed do/_/dus kyi seng ges skyes bu [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]rnams rab tu bcom nas za bar byed do/_/'chi bdag gi dus ni chu bo dang mtshungs pas skyes bu'i ljon shing rnams mngon par bsdus shing bskyed nas 'joms par byed do/_/dus ni spyang ku dang mtshungs pa dang sbrul dang mtshungs 
[\[209b.3\]]pa'i phyir na skyes bu rnams gsod par byed do/_/'chi bdag ni glang po che dang 'dra bas rtswa ka ta pa ta dang mtshungs pa'i kham gyis mid par byed do/_/'chi bdag ni rlung dang mtshungs pas skyes bu'i ljon shing rnams rtsa ba nas sgyel bar byed do/_/skye bo rnams thams cad kyis kyang 
[\[209b.4\]]spang bar mi nus pa'i 'chi bdag gi 'jigs pa de dag rnams skyes bu rnams ci'i phyir kun tu ma rtogs pa yin no/_/gang gis lang tsho la bab pa rnams thams cad la yang co 'dri bar byed pa dang /_stobs rnams thams cad 'jig par byed pa dang /_skye bo rnams thams cad kyis 
[\[209b.5\]]bzhad gad du byed pa'i rgas pa yang mthong ba ma yin na/_rten nyam chung bar byed pa dang /_mig dang /_rna ba dang /_sna dang /_lce dang /_lus dang /_yid rnams dang nye bar 'gal bar byed pa dang /_kha chu rnam par 'dzag par byed pa dang /_sgur por byed pa dang /_'gram 
[\[209b.6\]]pa dang /_so dang /_thod pa dang /_tshigs pa dang /_gnad dang /_rgyus pa rnams nyams par byed pa dang /_'gro ba dang 'ong ba'i gnas rnams la gegs byed pa por gyur pa/_lang tsho la bab pa rnams thams cad la 'gran zlar gyur pa/_lang tsho la bab pa rnams thams cad kyang kha 
[\[209b.7\]]nyen pa'i sar gyur pa/_'chi bdag rgyal po'i grong khyer du 'jug par byed pa po dga' ba dang /_stobs dang spro ba rnams 'jig par byed pa po/_sgyu snyom pa la dga' bar gyur pa'i sa pa/_snabs dang gcin dang rtug pa rnams mang bar gyur pa/_rtag tu yang mal stan la lhag par 
[\[210a\]]
[\[210a.1\]]snyom las su byed pa por gyur pa/_sems can bag med pa 'di dag rnams kyis ci'i phyir ma mthong /_gang gi tshe 'jigs par 'gyur ba'i nad kyi 'jigs pa yang nges par 'jigs par gyur pas shin tu nye bar gnas pa yin te/_des ni khams rnams 'khrug 
[\[210a.2\]]par byed pa dang /_dbang po rnams thams cad kyang longs spyod par byed pa dang /_rgyus pa dang /_rkang mar dang /_bcud dang /_pags pa dang /_khrag dang /_sha dang /_tshil dang /_rus pa dang /_khu chu dang rnams thams cad kyang kun tu skams par byed pa dang /_khu ba 
[\[210a.3\]]rnams thams cad kyi 'gran nga ba'i dgrar gyur pa dang /_langs par bya ba dang /_legs par 'dug par yang mi bzad pa sman dang /_sman pa la ltos nas bzlog par bya ba bza' ba dang /_btung ba dang /_bldag pa dang /_myang bar bya ba la sogs pa rnams thams cad kyang mi gtsang 
[\[210a.4\]]ba lta bur gyur pa/_rid pa dang nyam chung ba dang gnyid phal che bar 'gyur te/_pags pa dang /_rus pa tsam dang /_skye bo thams cad rang gi skye bo dang /_grogs po dang /_nye 'brel dang /_bu dang /_chung ma dang bcas pa 'chi bdag dang 'dra ba'i sdug bsngal gang yin pa'i 
[\[210a.5\]]nad kyi 'jigs pas bdag nyid bying bar 'gyur bar rtogs pa yin no/_/rnal 'byor spyod pa de skyes bu bag med par gyur pa de dag rnams la rjes su brtse bar 'gyur ro/_/brtse bar gyur pas kyang 'di'i tshangs pa'i gnas kyi spyod yul du gyur pa rnams la 'di lta ste/_byams pa dang /_
[\[210a.6\]]snying rje dang /_dga' ba'o/_/de ltar rnal 'byor spyod pa des byang phyogs sgra mi snyan pa'i skyes bu bag med pas gnas par gyur pa'i sems can rnams la rjes su brtse bar byed do/_/'khor ba'i bdag nyid ni shin tu dman pa yin par mthong ngo /_/dbu ba dang chu'i chu bur lta bur gyur 
[\[210a.7\]]pa'i lus la kun tu lta bar byed do/_/sgyu ma lta bur gyur pa'i rnam par shes pa la ye shes kyis kun tu lta bar byed do/_/rmi lam gyi nang dang 'dra bar gyur pa'i phun sum tshogs pa rnams la kun tu lta bar byed do/_/nges pa kho nar yang yid 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/gzhan yang rnal 
[\[210b\]]
[\[210b.1\]]'byor spyod pa phyi rol gyi lus kyis lus la rjes su lta zhing gnas te/_byang phyogs sgra mi snyan na ri'i rigs sam/_chu klung gi rigs sam/_ljon shing gi rigs su gyur pa dga' ba dang /_shin tu dga' ba dang /_mchog tu dga' bar gyur pa gzhan ci zhe na/_des thos pa las 
[\[210b.2\]]byung ba'i shes rab kyis sam lha'i mig gis mthong bar gyur pa/_byang gi sgra mi snyan na ri gzhan kun dga' ba 'dzin pa zhes bya ba dpag tshad stong pa yod do/_/ri kun dga' ba 'dzin pa'i nye 'khor na ni rgyu 'thun pa zhes bya ba'i nags dpag tshad lnga brgya pa yod do/_/nags de 
[\[210b.3\]]na ni 'byung khungs rnams thams cad dang ldan no/_/de la 'byung khungs 'di dag rnams yod de/_'di lta ste/_gser gyi 'byung khungs dang /_dngul gyi 'byung khungs dang /_zangs kyi 'byung khungs dang /_chang gi 'byung khungs dang /_sbrang rtsi'i 'byung khungs dang /_ro drug gi 
[\[210b.4\]]'byung khungs rnams te/_'byung khungs de dag dang gzhan dag rnams kyang de dag la yod pa yin no/_/rgyu 'thun pa'i nye 'khor rnams ni dga' bar gyur pa yin te/_gang la bai DUr+ya dang mtshungs par gyur pa'i ljon shing rnams la ni me tog gi 'khri shing rnams kyis yongs su bskor 
[\[210b.5\]]ba dang /_gser gyi 'dab ma'i pad ma'i rdzing bu rnams kyi ni dngul gyi yu ba can yin no/_/dngul gyi 'dab ma la ni gser gyi yu ba can yin no/_/gser dang dngul gyi 'dab ma rnams la ni bai DUr+ya'i yu ba can rnams te/_nyi ma shar ma thag thog ltar dmar ba'i pad ma rnams kyis 
[\[210b.6\]]khyab par gyur pa'i pad ma'i rdzing bu de dag rnams la bya sna tshogs pa rnams kyis nye bar mdzes pa'o/_/'di lta ste/_ngang pa dang /_khrung khrung dang /_be kaiHdang /_mtsho'i khrung khrung dang /_ka dam+ba dang /[ {]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]kyi mgrin pa pa dang /_chu bya dang /_ma ta b+ha ba dang /_p+la bAH
[\[210b.7\]]dang /_tsakra bA dang /_bA lu kA dang /_Ad+yAHdang /_sA ra sI dang /_bi lA lAHdang /_dus su rjod par byed pa dang /_uSh+Na bI ra baHdang /_mtshan mo rgyu ba dang /_pad ma'i rdul la dga' ba dang /_sin+d+hu'i rlabs dang /_rlabs las skyes pa dang ste/_bya'i rigs nyi shu po 
[\[211a\]]
[\[211a.1\]]de dag rnams pad ma'i rdzing bu de na yod do/_/rgyu 'thun pa zhes bya ba'i nags kyi nye 'khor de las shin tu 'das nas kun dga' ba 'dzin pa'i ri'i phyed du gyur pa na dpag tshad brgya yin te/_de la 'od ma'i klung na nges par gnas pa zhes bya ba'i skyes bu rnams yod 
[\[211a.2\]]do/_/gang dag gser gyi rang bzhin du gyur pa'i ljon shing gi tshogs na de dag glu len par byed pa na yang nam mkha' la gnas nas lha'i bu mo rnams kyang nyan par byed do/_/chu klung dang /_mtshe'u dang /_nye ba'i nags dang /_bya rnams kyang phun sum tshogs par gyur pa ni yul 'di 
[\[211a.3\]]la yang sngar gyi bzhin no/_/gzhan yang rnal 'byor spyod pa pas sems can rnams kyi las kyi rnam par smin pa rnams yang dag par rjes su mthong ste/_sems can 'di dag rnams ni ngu bar byar yod pa la glu len par byed do/_/ci'i phyir 'di dag rnams ma mthong ba yin/_bag 
[\[211a.4\]]med pas bag med par rnam par rgyu ba'i phyir na dmyal ba pa rnams su ni ngu bar 'gyur ba yin na/_kun tu go bar yang ma yin no/_/sred pa'i zhags pa'i 'ching bas bcings par gyur pa'i sems can rnams kyis lus dang ngag dang yid kyis nyes par spyod pa gang yin pa de rnams byed 
[\[211a.5\]]do/_/de'i rnam par smin pa rnams ni rtsub pa yin pas dmyal ba dang [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]dang /_dud 'gro rnams su skye bar 'gyur ro/_/las rnams ji lta ba bzhin du nye bar 'gro ba yin pas yang sos dang /_thig nag dang /_bsdus 'joms dang /_ngu 'bod dang /_ngu 'bod chen po dang /_
[\[211a.6\]]tsha ba dang /_rab tu tsha ba'i dmyal ba rnams su ngu ba dang lhang kyog rnam pa sna tshogs pa rnams kyis mngon par 'joms par byed do/_/'dod pa'i sgra dang /_reg bya dang /_ro dang /_gzugs dang /_dri'i sred pa rnam pa lngas kun nas nye bar bcings nas sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i 
[\[211a.7\]]mtha' la sems can gyi rgya mtsho 'khor ba yin no/_/de ltar rnal 'byor spyod pa pas 'od ma'i klung la nges par gnas pa'i skyes bu rnams la kun tu bltas par gyur pas kyang yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du phyi rol gyi lus la lta bar byed do/_/gzhan yang rnal 'byor spyod pa phyi rol gyi 
[\[211b\]]
[\[211b.1\]]lus kyis lus la rjes su lta zhing gnas te/_byang phyogs sgra mi snyan na dga' ba'am ches dga' bar gyur pa gzhan ci zhe na/_des thos pa las byung ba'i shes rab kyis sam lha'i mig gis mthong bar gyur pa/_byang phyogs sgra mi snyan na ri gzhan yang yod de/_yid kyi rjes su 
[\[211b.2\]]'thun pa zhes bya ba'i dpag tshad ni stong du gyur pa yin no/_/ri de'i dga' bar gyur pa rnams ni mi 'am ci mo rnams kyis rtag pa kho nar glu len par byed pa yin te/_ri'i rtse mo rnams dang /_nags rnams dang /_nye ba'i nags rnams dang /_ri ngos rnams dang /_ri'i phug rnams 
[\[211b.3\]]dang /_rdzing bu rnams dang /_shing ke ta ka'i nags rnams dang /_klu'i nags kyi nang rnams dang /_nA ri ke la'i nags rnams dang /_shing pa na sa'i nags rnams dang /_a ru ra'i nags rnams dang /_a mra'i nags rnams dang /_chu shing gi nags rnams dang /_gser 
[\[211b.4\]]gyi dpal 'bras kyi shing gi nags rnams dang /_ka pit+tha'i nags rnams dang /_rma bya'i nags rnams dang /_khu byug gi nags rnams dang /_ne tso'i nags kyi nang rnams dang /_chu klung dang /_khrus kyi rdzing bu dang /_nye ba'i nags rnams dang /_pad ma'i tshal rnams dang /_
[\[211b.5\]]ut+pa la'i tshal rnams dang /_sin+du ba ra'i nags rnams dang /_grub pa'i nags rnams dang /_tsU ta'i nags rnams dang /_ku ra ra'i nags rnams dang /_gson pa gson pa'i nags rnams dang /_taN+Da'i nags rnams dang /_rdzing bu dga' bar gyur pa rnams la thams 
[\[211b.6\]]cad kyang rin po che'i sgra snyan pa yang dag par ldan pa/_skye bo rnams thams cad kyi rna bar yang snyan par gyur pa/_sred pa'i zil gyis mnan par gyur pa'i byis pa'i blo can rnams la slar yang brgya 'gyur du sred pa'i me kun tu 'bar bar 'gyur bar mi 'am ci mo rnams kyis glu len par 
[\[211b.7\]]byed do/_/de dag gi sgra dbyangs kyis [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]rnams kyang sgra 'byin par byed do/_/lhan cig spyod par byed do/_/lhan cig spyod par gyur pa'i bya'i tshogs rnams kyang lhan cig tu rtse dga' bar byed do/_/bdud rtsir rtag tu rung ba'i 'bras bu rnams kyang legs par mid par byed 
[\[212a\]]
[\[212a.1\]]do/_/bung ba rnams kyang rtsi de ga la 'thung bar byed do/_/rig pa 'dzin pa rnams dang lha'i bu mo rnams kyang nam mkha' la 'dus nas nyan par byed do/_/de ltar yid kyi rjes su 'thun pa'i ri la mi 'am ci mo de dag rnams kyi glu dga' zhing snyan pa yin no/_/ri 
[\[212a.2\]]de'i nye 'khor rnams na yang bai DUr+ya'i rang bzhin dang /_gser gyi brag dang /_dngul gyi rdo ba dang /_bi dru ma'i ljon shing dang /_mu tig gi phye ma dang /_byi ru'i kong bu rnams dang /_shel gyi rdo ba dang /_dung gi kong bu 'jam po rnams dang /_gser gyi pad ma'i rdzing bu rnams la ngang pa rnams kyis nye bar 
[\[212a.3\]]mdzes par byas pa dang /_lus rin po che rnam pa sna tshogs pa las grub pa'i [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]rnams dang /_ko ki la'i sgra dang bcas pa'i nags dang /_rma bya dang /_shang shang te'u'i sgra snyan pa rnams dang /_khrus kyi rdzing bu na bung ba'i sgra snyan par gyur pa rnams te/_de ltar yid kyi rjes su 'thun 
[\[212a.4\]]pa'i ri'i dga' ba yin no/_/skye bo rnams thams cad kyi mig dang rna bar sdug cing snyan pa yin no/_/thams cad du yang rab tu dga' ba dang /_rgod pa dang /_rol pa dang /_rtse bar byed pa dang /_yongs su spyod pa dang /_mi pho mo dang /_bya'i tshogs rnams kyis kyang yid bde bar 
[\[212a.5\]]byed pa yin no/_/ri rab lhun po gnyis pa lta bur gyur pa dpag tshad nyis stong 'phang du'o/_/mtho ba'i yid kyis rjes su 'thun pa'i ri de'i 'od kyis dpag tshad nyis stong du mdog skya bor byed do/_/bai DUr+ya'i 'od kyi gzi brjid kyis gser gyi mdog dang ljon shing sngon po rnams kyang nye bar bcom nas 
[\[212a.6\]]ri skya bor byed do/_/dper na ri rab lhun po'i gser mdog bzang po'i gzi brjid kyis rtswa rnams thams cad kyang gser bzhin du 'gyur ro/_/'di lta ste/_yid kyi rjes su 'thun pa'i ri'i gzi brjid kyis kyang thams cad skya bor 'gyur ro/_/[{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]dang /_bya dang /_chu dang /_mtshe'u 
[\[212a.7\]]dang /_chu klung dang /_ljon shing dang /_pad ma rnams kyang phun sum tshogs pa ni ri 'di la yang sngar gyi bzhin no/_/ri bo yid kyi rjes su 'thun pa'i nye 'khor na skyes bu gang dag rab tu gnas pa de dag rnams ni skya bor snang ba zhes bya ba'i ming du 'gyur ro/_/skya bor snang ba'i skye bo rnams 
[\[212b\]]
[\[212b.1\]]ni gzi brjid che ba dang /_gzugs chen po dang ldan pa dang /_mchog tu dga' ba dang /_mchog tu mdzes pa dang /_me tog gi phreng ba dang /_phye ma dang /_dri dang /_byug pa dang /_rgod pa dang /_'gying bag dang /_gar dang /_glu dang /_rol mo'i sgra rnams la dga' bar gyur pa 
[\[212b.2\]]dang /_phan tshun phrag dog dang ser sna'i dri ma rnams nye bar bcom pa dang /_bdag gi ba med cing nga rgyal med pa dang /_skya bor snang ba'i skyes bu rnams thams cad nyid kyang phreng ba dang /_phye ma dang /_dri dang /_byug pa rnams kyis lus brgyan pa yin no/_/rnam pa sna tshogs 
[\[212b.3\]]pa'i rol mo'i sgra dang /_glu dang /_dri za'i sgra rnams kun nas rjod par byed pa'i chos dga' bar 'gyur ba rnams kyis thams cad nyid dga' bar byed do/_/yid la smon pa'i kun tu bsams pa rnams kyang gang dang gang dag yid la sems par byed pa de rnams de dag las 'byung bar 
[\[212b.4\]]'gyur te/_'di lta ste ma btags pa'i gos dang rnam pa sna tshogs pa rnams dang /_rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i do shal rnams dang /_de la 'os par gyur pa'i rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i rgyan rnams dang /_nyal ba'am rab tu sad par gyur pa na yang thos na dga' bar 'gyur ba yid du 'ong 
[\[212b.5\]]ba las kyang yid du 'ong bar gyur pa'i sgra ma 'dres pa rnams rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i bya brgya stong du ma rnams kyis sgrogs par byed do/_/rigs brgya phrag du ma'i pad ma'i rdzing bu rnams kyi dri zhim po rnams kyang rtag tu snom par byed do/_/skya bor snang ba'i skyes bu rnams kyis de ltar 
[\[212b.6\]]bzang po'i las kyi 'bras bu sprul pa'i bde ba rnams nyams su myong bar byed do/_/de bzhin du dman pa dang /_bar ma dang /_mchog tu legs par byas pa rnams kyang yin no/_/gzhan yang rnal 'byor spyod pa pa las kyi chos kyi rnam par smin pa la rjes su lta bar byed de/_kye ma 
[\[212b.7\]]ji ltar na sems can 'di dag rnams kyis legs par byas pa'i las zad pa rjes su ma mthong ba yin/_'di dag rnams kyi mngon sum du ma gyur pa yin nam ce na/_ji ltar skye ba'i sdug bsngal ni dang po nyid du pha ma gnyis kyi khu chu dang khrag de dag gnyis kyis mi stong par gyur pa'i 
[\[213a\]]
[\[213a.1\]]gcin gyi nang du gsus pa'i smad kyi rus pa'i rang bzhin gyi rnam pa zhing gi gdub kor lta bu'i mngal du rnam par shes pa'i sa bon skye'o/_/de yang las kyi rlung gis bu snod bskor bar gyur pas nyi ma bdun pa la mer mer por 'gyur ro/_/srog gcod pa spangs pas mer mer 
[\[213a.2\]]por gyur pa de la gnas pa na yang rnam par shes pa mi 'pho'o/_/nyi ma bdun pa gzhan la ni gor gor por 'gyur ro/_/rnam par shes pa yang las dang nyon mongs pa dang bcas pa'i dbang gis de nyid la rmongs nas gnas so/_/de la gnas pa nyid kyang nyi ma bdun pa yin te/_nyi ma 
[\[213a.3\]]bdun na sha'i gong bur 'gyur ro/_/gcin dang rtug pa'i tshogs rnams kyang ma'i gsus pa'i smad du yin zhing /_gang dang gang dag ma'i bya bar gyur pa'i lus rnam par bskyod pa dang zas kyis byas pa rnams kyang rung ste/_de dang de dag rnams nyid kyis 'di gzir bar 'gyur/_ji ltar 
[\[213a.4\]]gtun shing gis bu ram gyi shing 'tshir bar byed pa de ltar mngal na gnas pa 'tshir bar byed do/_/gzhan yang las kyi rlung gis sha'i gong bu drangs par gyur pas sbom por 'gyur ro/_/de las ni rdog rdog lnga 'byung bar 'gyur te/_rkang pa gnyis kyi dang /_lag pa gnyis kyi dang /_
[\[213a.5\]]mgo'i'o/_/gzhan yang las kyi rlung gis bskor bar gyur pas mngal na skye ba ni ma'i gsus par 'byung bar 'gyur la/_de las kyang lte ba'i sbu gu 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/sbu gu de ni ma'i mkhal ma'i nang nas 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/gang yang grang ba dang /_dro ba dang /_ro bzang ba 
[\[213a.6\]]dang /_ro ngan pa rnams kyang rung ste/_mas zas zos pa'i ro de yang de la sbu gu de nas 'jug go/_/lte ba nas zas kyi ro gang yin pa des mngal na gnas pa 'di kun tu 'tsho bar byed do/_/de ltar mngal gyis byas pa'i shin tu sdug bsngal ba dang /_khyad par du btsog pa rnams nyams 
[\[213a.7\]]su myong bar 'gyur ro/_/de gal te mngal na gnas pa na dus byed par ma gyur na ni de gcin dang khrag gi gnas skabs na gnas pa'i de la thams cad rdzogs par gyur nas zla ba bcu na zur ma mig gi nang nas 'dren pas bur shing ltar yan lag dang nying lag thams cad 'tshir bar gyur pas ma'i 
[\[213b\]]
[\[213b.1\]]skye gnas nas 'byung ba yin no/_/skyes nas kyang rlung dang tsha bas reg par gyur pas sdug bsngal gyi mchog rnams nyams su myong bar 'gyur ro/_/skyes par gyur nas kyang mas 'di bor nas gar 'dod pa kun tu rgyu bar 'gyur ro/_/de yang bdag nyid kyi mtheb mo nu bar byed do/_/
[\[213b.2\]]de las 'o ma 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/des kyang bdag nyid 'tsho bar 'gyur ro/_/de ltar dus de nyid kyi tshe na byis pa yin te/_lhag pas ni lang tsho la reg par 'gyur ro/_/de dag rnams ni dus kyi rlung gis nges par btab pa yin na/_des na sems can de dag rnams las kyi bgo 
[\[213b.3\]]skal la spyod par byed pa dang /_las kyi skye gnas par gyur pa dang /_las brtan par byas pa rnams yin te/_dge ba'am mi dge bar gyur pa rnams kyang rung ste/_ji ltar las byas par gyur pa'i las de dang de dag rnams kyi skal ba can du 'gyur ba yin no/_/'on kyang skyes bu de dag rnams 
[\[213b.4\]]kyis ni las dang rnam par smin pa rnams mngon sum du mthong ba yang ma yin no/_/kye ma kyi hud bag med par rnam par rgyu ba'i sems can 'di dag rnams ni shin tu sdug bsngal ba yin te/_gang gi phyir sdug bsngal gyi mchog tu gyur pa'i ljon shing rnams kyi rtsa ba yang skye ba yin no/_/
[\[213b.5\]]skye ba yod par gyur nas tsha ba dang /_grang ba dang /_ltogs pa dang /_skom pa dang /_ngal ba dang /_nyam chung ba dang /_mi 'thun pa dang phrad pa dang /_'thun pa dang bral ba dang /_rga ba dang /_'chi ba rnams kyang 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/'khor ba na sdug bsngal phul du byung bar 
[\[213b.6\]]'gyur ba ni skye ba yin no/_/'khor ba 'di ni phun sum tshogs pa dang rgud pa'i phyang mo nyug pa la zhon pa yin no/_/'khor ba 'di ni mi rtag pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_stong pa dang /_bdag med pa yin no/_/ji ltar ri rnams dang /_nags dang /_shang shong dang bcas pa 
[\[213b.7\]]rnams dang /_nags dang /_nye ba'i nags dang /_chu klung dang /_ljon shing dang /_bya dang /_me tog dang /_'bras bu dang /_ri'i khrod dang /_g.yang kha dang /_rin po che dang 'di dag rnams kyang med par 'gyur ba yin na/_byang phyogs sgra mi snyan pa'i skyes bu 'di dag rnams kyis 
[\[214a\]]
[\[214a.1\]]ci'i phyir na ma go_/mya ngan dang bral bar 'gyur ba dang /_dus kyi mtha' la ni thams cad kyang thal bar 'gyur ro/_/byang phyogs sgra mi snyan gyi gling 'di yang stongs par 'gyur ro/_/skyes bu 'di dag rnams thams cad kyang dus byas par gyur nas lha'i 'jig 
[\[214a.2\]]rten du mngon par 'byung bar 'gyur la/_de nas ni dmyal ba dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]dang /_dud 'gro rnams su skye bar 'gyur te/_rang gi las kyi bgo skal la spyod pa yin pa'i phyir ro/_/de ltar rnal 'byor spyod pa pa des las kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa rnams rjes su mthong bar gyur pa 
[\[214a.3\]]na skya bor snang ba'i skyes bu rnams la rjes su brtse ba skye bar 'gyur ro/_/'khor ba'i bdag nyid ni ngan pa yin par mthong ngo /_/gzhan yang rnal 'byor spyod pa phyi rol gyi lus kyis lus la rjes su lta zhing gnas te/_gzhan byang phyogs sgra mi snyan na dga' ba'am ches dga' bar 
[\[214a.4\]]gyur pa yod dam zhe na/_des thos pa las byung ba'i shes rab kyis sam lha'i mig gis mthong bar gyur pa pad ma ku she sha ya dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ri'o/_/pad ma ku she sha ya dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ri dpag tshad stong du gyur pa la/_chu bsil ba dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i pad ma'i rdzing 
[\[214a.5\]]bu dpag tshad lnga brgya pa yod de/_gser gyi kha dog dang ldan pa'i pad mas khyab par gyur pa 'dam med pa bung ba dang /_ngang pa dang /_kA raN+Da ba dang /_tsakra bA kAHrnams kyis nye bar mdzes par byas pa yin no/_/pad ma'i rdzing bu de na yang lha'i me tog pad ma ku she sha ya dang /_lha'i 
[\[214a.6\]]man dA ra ba dang /_ku su ma dang /_ljon shing dang /_me tog dang /_'bras bu dang /_chu klung dang /_ri khrod dang /_bya dang /_nags dang /_nye ba'i nags dang /_rdzing bu dga' bar gyur pa rnams dang /_bsil ba'i chu rnams ni sngar gyi bzhin no/_/pad ma ku she sha ya dang ldan pa'i 
[\[214a.7\]]ri'i phyed du gyur pa dpag tshad lnga brgya la mchog tu dga' bar gyur pa'i gzhal yas khang stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi yod do/_/'di lta ste/_gser dang dngul gyi rang bzhin rnams la ni gser gyi stegs bu dang ldan no/_/shel gyi rang bzhin rnams la ni bai DUr+ya'i stegs bu dang ldan no/_/
[\[214b\]]
[\[214b.1\]]bai DUr+ya'i rang bzhin rnams la ni shel gyi stegs bu dang ldan no/_/in dra nI la'i rang bzhin rnams la ni mu sa ra galba'i stegs bu dang ldan no/_/mu sa ra galba'i rang bzhin rnams la ni in+d+ra nI la'i stegs bu dang ldan no/_/de bzhin du phan tshun du rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i skyes bu rnams 
[\[214b.2\]]kyis legs par brgyan pa dang /_dril bu g.yer ka'i dra bas kun tu g.yogs pa dang /_glu dang /_gar dang /_rgod pa dang /_rnga sgra rab tu sgrogs par byed pa dang /_rtag tu rab tu dga' bar gyur pa dang /_rgun 'bru'i chu klung rnams kyis yongs su bskor ba dang /_nags dang nye 
[\[214b.3\]]ba'i nags rnams kyis legs par khyab par gyur pa yin te/_dper bya na lha rnams kyi grong khyer blta na sdug dang /_lha rnams kyi 'dun sa chos [{]bzangs kyi [,]bzang gi [}]gzhal yas khang rnams yin te/_de kho na bzhin du pad ma ku she sha ya dang ldan pa'i ri'i gzhal yas khang stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi 
[\[214b.4\]]yin no/_/nags dang /_nye ba'i nags dang /_rdzing bu dang /_ljon shing dang /_'bras bu phun sum tshogs pa rnams ni sngar gyi bzhin no/_/pad ma ku she sha ya dang ldan pa'i ri'i nye 'khor na skyes bu gang dag gnas pa de dag rnams ni rnam par bkra ba zhes bya ba'i ming du 'gyur 
[\[214b.5\]]ro/_/de dag rnams ni rtag tu rgod pa dang /_'gying ba dang /_rtse ba dang /_gar dang /_rol mo'i sgra dang /_zas dang /_skom dang /_'khrig pa la dga' ba rnams yin no/_/gzhan yang rnal 'byor spyod pa pa las kyi chos kyi rnam par smin pa rnams la rjes su lta bar byed de/_phan 
[\[214b.6\]]tshun rnam par 'bral ba las byung ba'i sdug bsngal sems can 'di dag rnams kyis ci'i phyir ma mthong na/_sems can 'di dag rnams thams cad kyi sdug pa dang /_yid du 'ong ba rnams thams cad kyang tha dad du 'gyur ba dang /_med par 'gyur ba dang /_rnam par 'gyes pa dang /_
[\[214b.7\]]rnam par 'bral ba dang /_gzhan du 'gyur ba yin no/_/sems can 'di dag rnams thams cad ni 'thun pa dang /_yid du 'ong ba rnams thams cad dang yang tha dad dang /_med pa dang /_rnam par 'thor ba dang /_gzhan du 'gyur ba rnams 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/las kyis ji 
[\[215a\]]
[\[215a.1\]]lta ba bzhin du nye bar 'gro ba yin te/_dge ba'i las rnams kyis ni lha dang mi'i nang du'o/_/mi dge ba'i las rnams kyis dmyal ba dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]dang /_dud 'gro rnams su'o/_/de la rnam par bkra ba'i gzugs dang ldan pa'i de dag rnams ni bag med par 
[\[215a.2\]]gnas pa yin pas 'dod pa'i sgra dang /_reg bya dang /_ro dang /_gzugs dang /_dri rnams kyis kyang ngoms pa med pa dang /_sred pas rnam par chags pa dang /_sred pa'i dbang du gyur pa dang /_sred pa'i chu bos khyer bar gyur pa dang /_'dod chags kyi mes sreg par byed pa/_
[\[215a.3\]]gti mug gi mun par nub par bying ba'i phyir na zad pa dang /_'grib pa'i bdag nyid rnams mi shes so/_/lang tsho la bab pa rnams gog por byed pa'i phyir na rga ba ni shin tu 'jigs pa yin no/_/rang gi skye bo dang grogs po dang gnyen 'brel rnams thams cad dang 'bral bar byed 
[\[215a.4\]]pa'i phyir rgol ba'i 'jigs par gyur pa gson pa'i ljon shing sreg par 'gyur zhing sems can rnams thams cad kyi nags lhag ma ma lus par sreg par 'gyur bas 'chi ba'i me nges par 'ong bar 'gyur ro/_/de dag ni mthong ba yang ma yin no/_/gzhan yang rnal 'byor spyod pa phyi 
[\[215a.5\]]rol gyi lus kyis lus la rjes su lta zhing gnas te/_ri bcus yongs su bskor bar gyur pa'i byang phyogs sgra mi snyan 'di lta ste/_saM kA sha dang /_rwa mnyam pa dang /[ {]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]kyi sgra dul ba dang /_sprin dkar po 'dzin pa dang /_mtho bar brtsegs pa dang /_nye 'khor phreng ba dang ldan 
[\[215a.6\]]pa dang /_dus na dga' ba dang /_kun dga' ba 'dzin pa dang /_yid kyi rjes su 'thun pa dang /_pad ma ku she sha ya dang ldan pa 'di dag rnams la nges par sems can 'di dag rnams las gang gis skyes pa yin zhe na/_des thos pa las byung ba'i shes rab kyis sam lha'i mig gis 
[\[215a.7\]]mthong bar gyur pa/_sngar bzhin du sems can de dag rnams ni dge ba'i las rnams las kun tu 'byung ba yin no/_/dge ba'i las rnams kyi mtha' la spyad par gyur pa yang srog gcod pa dang /_ma byin par len pa dang /_'dod pas log par g.yem pa rnams rab tu spangs par gyur cing /_
[\[215b\]]
[\[215b.1\]]chang dang bcos pa'i chang myos par 'gyur ba bag med pa'i gnas rnams kyang rab tu spangs pa dang /_'dir dge ba rnam pa bcu'i las kyi mtha' la spyad pa yin no/_/de dag rnams ni dge ba de'i las rnams kyi rkyen gyis skyes pa yin no/_/gzhan yang rnal 'byor spyod pa pa las 
[\[215b.2\]]dang chos dang rnam par smin pa rnams la rjes su lta bar byed de/_las gang dag gis skyes bu de dag rnams kyi drung dang skyes bu gzhan dag rnams kyi drung na yang gzugs kyi tshad dang /_stobs dang /_brtson 'grus dang /_dbyibs rnams ches khyad par du 'phags pa'i skyes bu gzhan 
[\[215b.3\]]yod dam zhe na/_des thos pa las byung ba'i shes rab kyis sam lha'i mig gis mthong bar gyur pa/_sems can de dag rnams ni yang dag pa'i lta ba mngon du byas pa/_g.yo ba med pa dang /_gzhan la gnod par mi byed pa dang /_drang po drang po'i rang bzhin can dang /_des par 
[\[215b.4\]]gyur pa dang /_des pa'i rang bzhin can dang /_chos pa dang chos kyi rjes su 'jug pa dang /_chos dang ldan pa'i skyes bu rnams lhan cig 'grogs par byed pa rnams ni rgyu de dang rkyen de las lus zhig par gyur nas bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten pa lha rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur te/_
[\[215b.5\]]rgyal chen ris bzhi dang /_sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnams su'o/_/de las shi 'phos par gyur nas kyang 'dir skye bar 'gyur ro/_/'di las shi 'phos par gyur nas kyang der skye bar 'gyur ro/_/gzhan yang rnal 'byor spyod pa pa las kyi chos kyi rnam par smin pa rnams la lta bar byed 
[\[215b.6\]]de/_las gang dag gis sems can de dag rnams ches khyad par du 'phags pa yin zhe na/_des thos pa las byung ba'i shes rab kyis sam lha'i mig gis mthong bar gyur pa de rnams ni thams cad kyis kyang sngon mi 'jigs pa'i sbyin pa rab tu byin par gyur pa yin te/_grong khyer gyi lho 
[\[215b.7\]]phyogs kyi sgor khrid par gyur pa'i sems can shin tu skrag pa rnams la srog gi sbyin pa byin pa yin la/_rgyab tu lag pa dam por bcings shing dur khrod du kha phyogs par gyur nas gsod pa'i rnga pa Ta ha brdungs par gyur cing /_gshed ma'i mi gtum po phyi bzhin rjes su 'brang bar gyur pa 
[\[216a\]]
[\[216a.1\]]rnams la srog gi sbyin pa byin pa yin no/_/rgyu de dang rkyen de las kyang lus zhig par gyur pa na bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten pa lha rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur te/_rgyal chen ris bzhi dang /_sum cu rtsa gsum dang /_'thab bral ba rnams su'o/_/gzhan 
[\[216a.2\]]yang rnal 'byor spyod pa pa phyi rol gyi lus kyis lus la rjes su lta zhing gnas te/_sems can de dag rnams kyis legs par byas pa'i las gang gis sems can de dag rnams ches khyad par du 'phags pa dang /_mchog tu khyad par du gyur pa'i dga' ba dang /_gzugs bzang ba 
[\[216a.3\]]dang /_rdzu 'phrul che ba'i mchog tu gyur pa dang /_skye bo rnams thams cad kyis mchod par byed pa yin zhe na/_des thos pa las byung ba'i shes rab kyis sam lha'i mig gis mthong bar gyur pa/_sems can de dag rnams ni sngon theg pa chen po la dad pa'i nor dang ldan pa'i ngang tshul 
[\[216a.4\]]can dang /_theg pa chen po sgrogs pa la dga' bar gyur pas yin no/_/gzhan yang sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa'i nyan thos kyi chos 'dul ba dag nyan par byed cing /_sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa'i gtam rgyud rnams kyang 'dzin par byed do/_/rjod par byed do/_/de sangs 
[\[216a.5\]]rgyas kyis gsungs pa'i chos kyi tshig gcig thos par gyur pa'i rgyu de dang rkyen de las kyang rgyal por 'gyur ba yin te/_gling bzhi la longs spyod par byed pa'i 'khor los sgyur bar 'gyur ro/_/de las shi bar gyur nas kyang lha rnams su skye bar 'gyur te/_gcig gnyis gsum bzhi 
[\[216a.6\]]lnga drug bdun bldabs shing gling bzhi la longs spyod par yang 'gyur ro/_/de las shi 'phos nas kyang lha rnams su skye bar 'gyur te/_'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur ro/_/'di lta ste/_rgyal chen ris bzhi dang /_sum cu rtsa gsum pa dang /_mtshe ma dang /_
[\[216a.7\]]dga' ldan dang /_'phrul dga' dang /_gzhan 'phrul dbang byed do/_/lha'i ris de dag rnams las shi 'phos par gyur nas 'dir skye ba yin te/_'di na yang byed pa dang ldan pa yid kyi sgra dang /_reg bya dang /_ro dang /_gzugs dang /_dri rnams nyams su myong bar byas nas 
[\[216b\]]
[\[216b.1\]]slar yang de dag tu skye bar 'gyur ro/_/phyis yang de nas shi 'phos par gyur pa na theg pa chen po nyan pa'i sa bon de nyid kyis bsam gtan dang po thob par 'gyur te/_de tshangs ris dang /_tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don dang /_tshangs pa chen po rnams su skye bar 'gyur ro/_/
[\[216b.2\]]gzhan yang theg pa chen po thos par gyur pa de nyid dang /_thos nas kyang rjes su spyad par gyur pa des bsam gtan gnyis pa 'thob par 'gyur te/_'od chung dang /_tshad med 'od dang /_'od gsal rnams su skye bar 'gyur ro/_/gzhan yang theg pa chen po thos par 
[\[216b.3\]]gyur pa'i sa bon de nyid dang /_thos par gyur nas kyang rjes su spyod cing spyod pa la zhugs pas ni bsam gtan gsum pa 'thob par 'gyur te/_dge chung dang /_dge rgyas dang /_tshad med dge dang rnams su skye bar 'gyur ro/_/gzhan yang theg pa chen po thos par gyur pa'i sa 
[\[216b.4\]]bon de nyid dang /_byas shing rjes su spyad la rnam grangs kun chub par byas shing yongs su dri ba byas pas kyang bsam gtan bzhi pa 'thob par 'gyur te/_sprin med pa dang /_bsod nams skyes dang /_'bras bu che ba rnams dang /_chags pa med pa'i ye shes kyi mes kun nas 
[\[216b.5\]]nyon mongs pa'i ljon shing gi nags rnams sreg par byed pa'i mi che ba dang /_mi gdung ba dang /_gya nom snang dang /_shin tu mthong dang /_'og min rnams su'o/_/gzhan yang theg pa chen po thos par gyur pa'i sa bon de nyid dang thos par gyur nas kyang rjes su spyad cing spyod pa la 
[\[216b.6\]]zhugs pa dang /_yongs su dri ba byas te/_sems can lta ba log pa rnams yang dag pa'i lta ba la bkod la theg pa chen po thos pa'i sa bon de nyid kyis kyang srid pa'i btson ra rnams thams cad zad pa'i rang sangs rgyas su 'gyur ba'am/_gzhan yang gal te bla na med pa yang dag 
[\[216b.7\]]par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi sems su yongs su smin par 'gyur ro/_/yang na gal te sems can rnams thams cad kyi bde ba 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i bla na med pa'i thugs rje chen po'i sems yongs su goms pa'i byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ro/_/theg pa chen po thos pa'i 
[\[217a\]]
